Acidic Poison Cloud Trap.description: Five nozzles hidden across the apartment's ceiling spew thick clouds of acidic poison from a reinforced tank behind the wall.
Acidic Poison Cloud Trap.hazardDisable: @Check[type:thievery|dc:35|name:Block One Nozzle|traits:action:disable-a-device] (expert) to block one of the nozzles or @Check[type:thievery|dc:40|name:Shut Off the Tank|traits:action:disable-a-device] (master) to shut off the tank. The trap deactivates after 5 rounds, once the tank is empty.
Acidic Poison Cloud Trap.hazardRoutine: (1 action) When it's triggered, the trap has five active nozzles, but at the end of its turn each round, one random nozzle deactivates. On the trap's turn, the active nozzles emit a cloud of acidic poison gas that expands to fill the apartment. The cloud deals @Damage[1d6[acid]] damage and @Damage[1d6[poison]] damage per active nozzle to each creature and object in the room (@Check[type:fortitude|dc:33|basic:true|name:Spew Cloud|traits:poison] save). Unattended objects automatically fail saves to avoid the damage.
Acidic Poison Cloud Trap.name: Acidic Poison Cloud Trap

ACezcH9GTIcXGlSB.description:
Requirements The astradaemon has killed a Large or smaller creature with Overtake Soul within the past 24 hours and that creature is within the daemon's reach

Effect The astradaemon takes over and wears the body of their victim. This automatically creates a disguise to allow the astradaemon to Impersonate the target creature. The body has a number of Hit Points equal to 3 times the level of the creature. Any damage targeting the astradaemon damages the body first. Once the body is reduced to 0 Hit Points, it's destroyed and forces the astradaemon out, back to the daemon's normal form. If the astradaemon takes any good damage while wearing the body, the damage is dealt to the astradaemon directly and it must succeed at a @Check[type:flat|dc:5] check or be forced out of the body. Additionally, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.ihbRf964JDXztcy3]{Disjunction} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{Dispel Magic} can force the astradaemon out of the body with a successful counteract check against DC 41.

While wearing the disguise, the astradaemon's attacks use the reach of the body it inhabits, and its size changes to match that of the creature whose soul it consumed. Additionally, the astradaemon is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 2} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 4} while wearing the disguise. (These penalties haven't been incorporated into this stat block.)
ACezcH9GTIcXGlSB.name: Mortal Shell

GJh2y3nd5dKEWe8I.description:
An astradaemon bends light, appearing shifted from its true position, though still in the same space.

Creatures targeting the astradaemon must attempt a @Check[type:flat|dc:11] check, as if the astradaemon were hidden, even though it remains observed.

Effects such as the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.y2XeMe1F18lIyo59]{Blind-Fight} feat and halfling's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.ancestryfeatures.Item.y1EmCv2cEb5hXBwx]{Keen Eyes} that apply on the flat check against hidden creatures also apply against a displaced astradaemon.
GJh2y3nd5dKEWe8I.name: Displacement

KyPmodj8yfI4cI99.description:
Requirements The astradaemon hasn't used an action with the attack trait yet this turn.

Effect The astradaemon draws out and consumes the soul of a living creature it has @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed}. The creature must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:39|traits:damaging-effect] save or instantly die. If it dies, the astradaemon gains 10 temporary Hit Points.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.Item.xiOi7btey4AS6jhe]{Effect: Overtake Soul}
KyPmodj8yfI4cI99.name: Overtake Soul

YoEkR6sBza4UBMYy.description:
When an astradaemon hits with its claw, jaws, or tail, it drains the target's spiritual and vital essences.

The target takes @Damage[2d10[void]] damage and the astradaemon regains an equal number of Hit Points. The target must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:37|traits:damaging-effect] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{Doomed 1} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 1}.

If the target was already drained or doomed, it instead increases both conditions' value by 1, to a maximum of 4.
YoEkR6sBza4UBMYy.name: Essence Drain

vJdzS91Cmz3WZZXD.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:30]{30 feet} @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Item.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{Aura}

An astradaemon draws power from the souls of the recently slain. If a Small or larger living creature dies within its aura, the astradaemon gains 5 temporary Hit Points and a +1 status bonus to attack and damage rolls for 1 round, unless the creature was slain by an astradaemon's Devour Soul ability.

Incorporeal undead and living spirits traveling outside the body take @Damage[1d8[force]] damage each round within the daemon's aura from the spiritual pressure as the astradaemon pulls in fragments of their soul.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.Item.SjrM6XVTLySToS12]{Effect: Soul Siphon}
vJdzS91Cmz3WZZXD.name: Soul Siphon

Agent of the Gray Queen.name: Agent of the Gray Queen
Agent of the Gray Queen.npcAllSaves: +1 status to all saves vs. magic

K287MomJCMfPXPLf.description: Smoke doesn't impair an agradaemon's vision; it ignores the concealed condition from smoke.
K287MomJCMfPXPLf.name: Smoke Vision

fC6dc9AdYYKBeuWn.description:
Frequency once per day

Effect The agradaemon designates a single willing mortal as a pledged fanatic. That creature gains resistance to fire equal to its level, immunity to the agradaemon's choking smog aura, and smoke vision.

The agradaemon can have up to 10 pledged fanatics at one time and can remove the status from any number of pledged fanatics as a free action with the concentrate trait. The status can also be removed with an @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.7Fd4lxozd11MQ55N]{Atone} ritual.
fC6dc9AdYYKBeuWn.name: Daemonic Pledge

n9d7kqBHgMv3tOmv.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:100]{100 feet} @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Item.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{Aura}

The agradaemon is surrounded by ashy smoke. Creatures within the aura are concealed, and creatures outside of it are concealed to creatures within it. Non-daemon creatures can't breathe in the aura and must hold their breath or suffocate.
n9d7kqBHgMv3tOmv.name: Choking Smog

pnx6alHWYJ3kLnBW.description:
The agradaemon regains 15 Hit Points, and a pledged fanatic of the agradaemon's choice that it can see loses 15 Hit Points (no effects apply that would decrease this Hit Point loss).

A pledged creature that dies in this way explodes and deals @Damage[9d10[fire]] damage in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:20] (@Check[type:reflex|dc:41|basic:true] save).
pnx6alHWYJ3kLnBW.name: Proven Devotion

Agradaemon.name: Agradaemon
Agradaemon.npcAllSaves: +1 status to all saves vs. magic

F0wNdQAwukZzTRRS.description:
The alchemical horror spews a torrent of alchemical fluids in a @Template[type:cone|distance:30] that deals @Damage[20d6[acid]] damage to creatures in the area (@Check[type:reflex|dc:43|basic:true] save).

The alchemical horror can't use this ability again for [[/br 1d4 #Recharge Alchemical Torrent]]{1d4 rounds}.
F0wNdQAwukZzTRRS.name: Alchemical Torrent

kEiDcm42Prsww2ja.description:
Trigger The alchemical horror takes damage from an alchemical bomb

Effect The volatile substances that compose the alchemical horror froth outward as they react with the bomb. The bomb's full effects affect creatures in every space within 15 feet of the alchemical horror, and splash damage affects creatures 5 feet beyond that.
kEiDcm42Prsww2ja.name: Alchemical Reaction

9gFnxK8QlnLCkXJE.description: This leather armor is reinforced with metal studs and sometimes small metal plates, providing most of the flexibility of leather armor with more robust protection.
9gFnxK8QlnLCkXJE.name: +1 Studded Leather Armor

DREnRy1SAHY6dCiU.description: moderate acid flask, moderate alchemist's fire, greater antidote, moderate bravo's brew, moderate elixir of life, moderate tanglefoot bag, wyvern poison
DREnRy1SAHY6dCiU.name: Alchemical Formulas (10th)

GRBBK98z5cdbknpi.description:
A formula book holds the formulas necessary to make items other than the common equipment from this chapter; alchemists typically get one for free. Each formula book can hold the formulas for up to 100 different items. Formulas can also appear on parchment sheets, tablets, and almost any other medium; there's no need for you to copy them into a specific book as long as you can keep them on hand to reference them.

Contains formulas for the following:

  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.SgtqZxt26BdjUmEB]{Acid Flask (Moderate)}
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.gWr4q4HiyGhETA8H]{Alchemist's Fire (Moderate)}
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.XWkeL34yJK6t5qUE]{Antidote (Greater)}
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.oCuwJ9IUDAuzsUwa]{Bravo's Brew (Moderate)}
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.c21stU5rhN4F2fZl]{Elixir of Life (Moderate)}
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.evBPzM1VsuYcoenn]{Tanglefoot Bag (Moderate)}
  • @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.WL4O32qFifxnMj0H]{Wyvern Poison}
GRBBK98z5cdbknpi.name: Formula Book

PigzABnoSkZuUAGP.description: Japu's bombs that have the splash trait deal 5 splash damage and splash to 10 feet.
PigzABnoSkZuUAGP.name: Expanded Splash

TFvB8Q4vaggsZeH2.description: Japu carries the following infused items, which last 24 hours or until the next time he makes his daily preparations: infused moderate acid flasks (2), infused moderate alchemist's fires (2), moderate elixirs of life (2), infused reagents (6), infused moderate tanglefoot bags (2).
TFvB8Q4vaggsZeH2.name: Infused Items

aBgGZkjF011ndSw8.description: This mobile collection of vials and chemicals can be used for simple alchemical tasks.
aBgGZkjF011ndSw8.name: Alchemist's Tools

iFX6Z8UsTWukjUxp.description:
Cost 1 batch of infused reagents

Effect Japu creates a single alchemical item from his formula book (see Alchemical Formulas). This item has the infused trait, but it remains potent only until the end of his next turn.
iFX6Z8UsTWukjUxp.name: Quick Alchemy

loHKBZQtnioHzbFm.description: Japu Interacts to draw a bomb then Strikes with it.
loHKBZQtnioHzbFm.name: Quick Bomber

yrhCj712cBYhVs5h.description:
These brass goggles are engraved with flame patterns and have thick, heavy lenses.

While worn, they give you a +1 item bonus to Crafting checks to Craft alchemical items and a +1 item bonus to attack rolls with alchemical bombs.

You can also ignore lesser cover when making Strikes with alchemical bombs.
yrhCj712cBYhVs5h.name: Alchemist Goggles

WeIVzFTJRVOOXc8w.description:
An almiraj takes a -2 status penalty to saving throws against occult spells.

Any beneficial occult spells with a duration of 1 round or longer cast on the almiraj last twice as long.
WeIVzFTJRVOOXc8w.name: Magic Susceptibility

oIOsV3m1VCQehtGp.description:
Any living creature slain by the almiraj's horn Strike immediately becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dTwPJuKgBQCMxixg]{Petrified} with no saving throw, in addition to dying.

A severed almiraj horn retains a wisp of its former magic; in combat, the horn can be wielded as a +1 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.rQWaJhI5Bko5x14Z]{dagger} or, if affixed to a shaft, a +1 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.tOhoGvmCMw4JpWcS]{spear}
oIOsV3m1VCQehtGp.name: Magic Horn

6Tw3xiLUkr4AYhGN.description: The chemist Interacts to draw a bomb then Strikes with it.
6Tw3xiLUkr4AYhGN.name: Quick Bomber

9gGdxZjwIsTVIuxu.description: lesser antidote, moderate bottled lightning, moderate frost vial, graveroot, hunting spider venom, moderate quicksilver mutagen, moderate silvertongue mutagen
9gGdxZjwIsTVIuxu.name: Alchemical Formulas (5th)

JzsJbViGU4nIhWiw.description: This mobile collection of vials and chemicals can be used for simple alchemical tasks.
JzsJbViGU4nIhWiw.name: Alchemist's Tools

QCKNcu26UUfwBynU.description: The chemist's bombs that have the splash trait deal 4 splash damage.
QCKNcu26UUfwBynU.name: Calculated Splash

fqPyHyqdqW4NMFk3.description: The chemist carries the following infused items, which last 24 hours or until the next time the amateur chemist makes their daily preparations: infused moderate bottled lightning (4), infused moderate frost vials (2), infused reagents (6), infused moderate silvertongue mutagens (2).
fqPyHyqdqW4NMFk3.name: Infused Items

zghmY4aHHsaTIPLa.description:
Cost 1 batch of infused reagents

Effect The chemist creates a single alchemical item from their formula book (see Alchemical Formulas). This item has the infused trait, but it remains potent only until the start of their next turn.
zghmY4aHHsaTIPLa.name: Quick Alchemy

GNoQny8KdUr88SvA.description: This type of armor is chain mail reinforced with flexible, interlocking metal plates, typically located on the wearer's torso, upper arms, and legs. A suit of this armor comes with an undercoat of padded armor (see above) and a pair of gauntlets.

Arcane Feedback Trap.description: A spike of stone bursts from the south wall and quickly retracts.
Arcane Feedback Trap.hazardDisable: @Check[type:arcana|dc:33|name:Quell Rippling Stone] (master) to quell the rippling stone or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{Dispel Magic} (7th level, counteract DC 31) to dispel the magical feedback.
Arcane Feedback Trap.name: Arcane Feedback Trap

4UovGCnsjker1UNi.description: The avarek's Strikes deal an additional 2d6 precision damage to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} creatures.

fu5LQi1ag0KXxEby.description:
The avarek withdraws beneath its spines, presenting a defensive, spiky exterior. It gains a +2 circumstance bonus to spine Strikes and AC. Any adjacent creature that attempts a melee attack against the avarek takes 1d6 piercing damage per attack, regardless of whether the attack hits.

Prickly Defense lasts until the avarek uses a move action or makes a Strike with any weapon other than its spines.
fu5LQi1ag0KXxEby.name: Prickly Defense

y4FvJN07K6t62yW1.description:
The avarek curls into a ball and rolls rapidly, impaling enemies with its spines. The avarek Strides twice and makes up to two spine Strikes at any point during its movement, each against a different target within reach.

These attacks count toward the avarek's multiple attack penalty, but the penalty doesn't increase until after the avarek makes all the attacks.
y4FvJN07K6t62yW1.name: Rolling Assault

AkqOlXLB6K0JLoqz.description:
Avsheros lets out an agonized wail that invokes grief and a feeling of betrayal in those who hear it.

All creatures within 120 feet must succeed at a @Check[type:will|dc:47] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 2}. A creature frightened in this way can't willingly accept aid of any kind from an ally until the frightened condition is removed.

On a successful save, the creature is immune to Avsheros's Wail of the Betrayed for 24 hours.
AkqOlXLB6K0JLoqz.name: Wail of the Betrayed

B8N51wc1bGZzdZ7d.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:60]{60 feet} @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Item.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{Aura}

When a creature ends its turn in the aura, it must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:45] save. If the creature fails, it is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 1} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 1} (@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 2} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 2} on a critical failure).

Avsheros can deactivate or activate this aura using a single action, which has the concentrate trait.

No matter the result of the save, a creature can't be affected by Avsheros's hateful gaze again for 1 minute.
B8N51wc1bGZzdZ7d.name: Hateful Gaze

WaEIc7jlHfXb63gH.description: Any weapon gains the effects of an @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.gmMrJREf4JSHd2dZ]{Unholy} property rune while Avsheros wields it.
WaEIc7jlHfXb63gH.name: Blasphemous Arms

Avsheros the Betrayer.name: Avsheros the Betrayer
Avsheros the Betrayer.npcAllSaves: +1 status to all saves vs. magic

Baatamidar.description: Baatamidars are drawn to destroy planar communities on the fringes where the Outer Planes touch the chaos of the Maelstrom. They resemble floating blobs of undulating, prismatic ooze with four quivering tentacles and dribbles of oily slime that always drip upwards.

K68kyyTQ4cOmTtUk.description:
The baatamidar's tentacles leech away thought. A creature that starts its turn grabbed by the baatamidar must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:41|traits:arcane,enchantment,incapacitation,mental] save.

Critical Success Unaffected.

Success @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 1} for 1 round.

Failure @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 3} for 1 minute.

Critical Failure @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 3} for an unlimited duration.
K68kyyTQ4cOmTtUk.name: Mind-Numbing Grasp

SvCc6HA58iZaOg9T.description:
1 mile @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Item.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{Aura}

Creatures who start their turn in the aura must succeed at a @Check[type:will|dc:48|traits:incapcitation] save or become unable to understand any communication (including telepathy), distinguish social rank or authority, or differentiate the relative value of objects or services. This persists for as long as the creature is in the aura.

Creatures who succeed at the save are temporarily immune for 1 hour (24 hours on a critical success). Proteans are immune to the unrelativity field.

The baatamidar can suppress this aura or activate it again as a free action.
SvCc6HA58iZaOg9T.name: Unrelativity Field

ZkE9BJn0zrQtzRMW.description:
The baatamidar makes up to four tentacle Strikes, each against a different target. Each attack counts separately for the baatamidar's multiple attack penalty, but the penalty doesn't increase until the baatamidar has made all the attacks.

If the baatamidar subsequently uses the Improved Grab action, it can Grab any number of creatures it hit with Writhing Arms.
ZkE9BJn0zrQtzRMW.name: Writhing Arms

Baatamidar.name: Baatamidar

5wVIixUHmaim2A4K.description:
Requirements The barnacle ghoul is adjacent to the corpse of a creature that died within the last hour.

Effect The barnacle ghoul devours a chunk of the corpse and regains [[/r 5d6[healing]]] Hit Points.

It can regain Hit Points from any given corpse only once.
5wVIixUHmaim2A4K.name: Consume Flesh

AT8OH6P1ZPmkA0CR.description:
Any living, non-elf creature hit by a ghoul's attack must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:26] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{Paralyzed}.

It can attempt a new save at the end of each of its turns, and the DC cumulatively decreases by 1 on each such save.
AT8OH6P1ZPmkA0CR.name: Paralysis

LxrfittzDR3SPd3W.description:
Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:26]

Stage 1 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 1} (1 round)

Stage 2 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 2} (1 round)

Stage 3 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 3} (1 round)

Stage 4 drowning and cannot reduce below stage 4 until the water is purged; purging the water requires a successful @Check[type:medicine|dc:26|name:Purge Water|traits:manipulate,action:administer-first-aid] check to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.MHLuKy4nQO2Z4Am1]{Administer First Aid} (which stops the creature from drowning and returns the creature to stage 3; stage 2 on a critical success) or a magical effect that removes curses or the sickened condition (which stops the creature from drowning and ends the curse).

If the creature dies from drowning, it rises as a barnacle ghoul the next midnight.
LxrfittzDR3SPd3W.name: Fill Lungs

Ma9MtDSiauZ5onNI.description: The barnacle ghoul Swims up to 20 feet. This movement doesn't trigger reactions.
Ma9MtDSiauZ5onNI.name: Nimble Swim

Qv8OyAidG7v9lnwp.description:
Trigger A creature grabbed by the barnacle ghoul critically fails a skill check to Escape

Effect The barnacle ghoul makes a claw Strike against the triggering creature.
Qv8OyAidG7v9lnwp.name: Tear Flesh

A7VgvFTQFpm1Cc79.description: The clockwork assassin launches a smoke bomb. A screen of thick, opaque smoke fills a @Template[type:burst|distance:10] within 60 feet of the clockwork assassin. Creatures within the area are concealed, and all other creatures are concealed to them. The smoke lasts for 1 minute or until dispersed by a strong wind.
A7VgvFTQFpm1Cc79.name: Smoke Bomb Launcher

GtoDWNmX34925xMc.description: Creatures hit by the clockwork assassin's rapier hand Strike are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} until the start of the clockwork assassin's next turn.
GtoDWNmX34925xMc.name: Unbalancing Blow

McLV2Lx51f0UF1YX.description:
Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:38]

Maximum Duration 10 rounds

Stage 1 @Damage[3d6[poison]] damage and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 1} (1 round)

Stage 2 @Damage[4d6[poison]] damage and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 2} (1 round).
McLV2Lx51f0UF1YX.name: Poison Ink

OF6N85WER1HxJgCK.description: A projectile launcher is integrated into a clockwork assassin's systems, containing 10 spinning blades and five smoke bombs. When the assassin is destroyed, the launcher and its ammunition are also destroyed.
OF6N85WER1HxJgCK.name: Integrated Launcher

Y7P7UpMZajGcxNz4.description: The clockwork assassin's Strikes deal an additional 3d6+4 precision damage to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} creatures.

mmdbAeOOVVjLALCx.description: The clockwork assassin spends 1 hour of its operational time to repair itself, regaining 25 Hit Points and refilling its integrated projectile launcher with 4 spinning blades (to a maximum of 10) and 2 smoke bombs (to a maximum of 5).
mmdbAeOOVVjLALCx.name: Rapid Repair

q4WljID3qrZ5Fpnr.description: For the clockwork assassin to act, it must be wound with a unique key by another creature. This takes 1 minute. Once wound, it remains operational for 24 hours, after which time it becomes unaware of its surroundings and can't act until it's wound again.The assassin can enter standby mode as a 3-action activity. Its operational time doesn't decrease in standby, but it can sense its surroundings (with a -2 penalty to Perception). It can't act, with one exception: when it perceives a creature, it can exit standby as a reaction (rolling initiative if appropriate).A creature can attempt a @Check[type:thievery|dc:33|name:Wind Down|traits:manipulate,action:disable-a-device] check to Disable a Device to wind the assassin down. For each success, the assassin loses 1 hour of operational time. This can be done even if the assassin is in standby mode.
q4WljID3qrZ5Fpnr.name: Wind-Up

yOvz4I15CCPk78ns.description: The clockwork assassin ignores the concealed condition from smoke.
yOvz4I15CCPk78ns.name: Smoke Vision

CIh6yDe29eBqfdsD.description:
Requirements Rekarek is adjacent to two or more enemies

Effect Rekarek makes three melee weapon Strikes, two of which must be against different enemies.

These attacks count toward her multiple attack penalty, but only after all three Strikes have been made.

After taking this activity, Rekarek is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} until the beginning of her next turn.
CIh6yDe29eBqfdsD.name: Haphazard Hack

Zc0ocF6ln2ziU1iE.description:
The binumir unleashes a distressing cry that fills others with wrenching sadness. Creatures within 30 feet must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:17] save.

Critical Success The target is unaffected and is temporarily immune to Agonizing Wail for 1 minute.

Success The target can't use reactions for 1 round.

Failure The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} and can't use reactions for 1 minute as it sobs uncontrollably. It can attempt a new Will save to end the effect at the end of each of its turns.

Critical Failure As failure, but the target can't make saves to end the effect.
Zc0ocF6ln2ziU1iE.name: Agonizing Wail

eJY1bfWIhxuD4h0H.description: The binumir's dual spirit takes longer to be affected by detrimental effects. When the binumir is the target of an effect that imparts the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{Confused}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.9qGBRpbX9NEwtAAr]{Controlled}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AdPVz7rbaVSRxHFg]{Fascinated}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned} condition, the condition is automatically suppressed until the end of the binumir's next turn.
eJY1bfWIhxuD4h0H.name: Delay Condition

wAYzRxbZPCt548k7.description:
The binumir makes four Strikes; no more than two can be against the same target.

These attacks count toward the binumir's multiple attack penalty, but the penalty doesn't increase until after all the attacks have been made.
wAYzRxbZPCt548k7.name: Dual Assault

157GGkuQcvXmLwPu.description: The guard makes three club Strikes against a single target, ignoring the multiple attack penalty until after all three attacks are completed.
157GGkuQcvXmLwPu.name: Hammering Flurry

CUtiSdjK9OwxIfKR.description:
Requirements A frightened creature is within melee reach of the Black Whale guard

Effect The guard makes a melee Strike against the frightened creature. If they hit and deal damage, the target becomes off-guard as long as it's frightened. If the target is already off-guard, it can't reduce its frightened value below 1 until the start of the guard's next turn.
CUtiSdjK9OwxIfKR.name: Shatter Defenses

SLWi3J2O0e3QXfYB.description: The guard makes a club Strike. On a hit, if the target is off-guard, the target must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:33] save or be stunned 2.
SLWi3J2O0e3QXfYB.name: Clobber

cerEbvB6QEc8UcuU.description:
Trigger An enemy within reach of the Black Whale guard attempts to move away

Effect The guard Strides up to their Speed, following the enemy and keeping the enemy in reach throughout its movement until the enemy stops moving or the guard moves their full Speed.
cerEbvB6QEc8UcuU.name: No Escape

157GGkuQcvXmLwPu.description: The guard makes three club Strikes against a single target, ignoring the multiple attack penalty until after all three attacks are completed.
157GGkuQcvXmLwPu.name: Hammering Flurry

CUtiSdjK9OwxIfKR.description:
Requirements A frightened creature is within melee reach of the Black Whale guard

Effect The guard makes a melee Strike against the frightened creature. If they hit and deal damage, the target becomes off-guard as long as it's frightened. If the target is already off-guard, it can't reduce its frightened value below 1 until the start of the guard's next turn.
CUtiSdjK9OwxIfKR.name: Shatter Defenses

SLWi3J2O0e3QXfYB.description: The guard makes a club Strike. On a hit, if the target is off-guard, the target must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:33] save or be stunned 2.
SLWi3J2O0e3QXfYB.name: Clobber

cerEbvB6QEc8UcuU.description:
Trigger An enemy within reach of the Black Whale guard attempts to move away

Effect The guard Strides up to their Speed, following the enemy and keeping the enemy in reach throughout its movement until the enemy stops moving or the guard moves their full Speed.
cerEbvB6QEc8UcuU.name: No Escape

jC7yNSXPp6Y4dqOF.description:
Frequency Once per day

The prison guard makes a club Strike. On a hit, the target must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:36] save.

Critical Success The target is unaffected and becomes immune to this ability for 24 hours.

Success The target is unaffected.

Failure The target is plagued by nightmarish visiona and becomes fatigued.

Critical Failure The target becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{Fatigued} and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 2} until no longer fatigued
jC7yNSXPp6Y4dqOF.name: Nightmare Assault

Blackfinger's Prayer.description: The trapdoor's metal is infused with a deadly toxin that seeps out when the trap is triggered.
Blackfinger's Prayer.hazardDisable: @Check[type:thievery|dc:50|name:Gum Up Trapdoor|traits:action:disable-a-device] (legendary) to gum up the trapdoor's porous metal surface, @Check[type:crafting|dc:45|name:Render Toxin Inert] (master) to render the toxin inert, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{Dispel Magic} (9th level; counteract DC 45) to counteract the trap's magic
Blackfinger's Prayer.name: Blackfinger's Prayer

PWYoCF0aSsWVwxCI.description: The acolyte deals an additional 2d6 precision damage to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} creatures.

aY23eLtS1QF1tT2T.description:
@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.QGXNqpP5KvSldoZz]{Giant Scorpion Venom}

Shorter than traditional arrows but similar in construction, bolts are the ammunition used by crossbows.
aY23eLtS1QF1tT2T.name: Bolts (Poisoned with Giant Scorpion Venom)

mDzfLBnuMo5KYFSr.description: When the acolyte casts @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.wdA52JJnsuQWeyqz]{Harm} to damage one creature, that creature is knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone} if it takes any damage from the spell. If the creature critically fails its save against the spell, it also takes a -10-foot status penalty to its Speed for 1 minute.
mDzfLBnuMo5KYFSr.name: Cast Down

1PFeWPAaM2Q1d2xI.description: A mix of flexible and molded boiled leather, a suit of this type of armor provides some protection with maximum flexibility.
1PFeWPAaM2Q1d2xI.name: +1 Leather Armor

dhPK5EdGfI5j8Yse.description: The Bloody Barber goon makes one dagger Strike and one club Strike, ignoring the multiple attack penalty until after the second Strike. Each Strike deals an additional 1d8 slashing or piercing damage (for the dagger) or bludgeoning damage (for the club).
dhPK5EdGfI5j8Yse.name: Thunk 'n' Slice

eyUSuPWwgWZeCeA7.description:
Trigger A creature within the monster's reach uses a manipulate action or a move action, makes a ranged attack, or leaves a square during a move action it's using.

Effect The monster attempts a melee Strike against the triggering creature. If the attack is a critical hit and the trigger was a manipulate action, the monster disrupts that action. This Strike doesn't count toward the monster's multiple attack penalty, and its multiple attack penalty doesn't apply to this Strike.
eyUSuPWwgWZeCeA7.name: Attack of Opportunity

hvsbuonawLt5vOLp.description:
Throwing your weight behind your attack, you hit your opponent hard enough to make it stumble back. Make a Strike with a two-handed melee weapon. If you hit a target that is your size or smaller, that creature is off-guard until the end of your current turn, and you can automatically Shove it, with the same benefits as the Shove action (including the critical success effect, if your Strike was a critical hit). If you move to follow the target, your movement doesn't trigger reactions. This Strike has the following failure effect.

Failure The target becomes off-guard until the end of your current turn.
hvsbuonawLt5vOLp.name: Brutish Shove

llp6T68rrWMMol0X.description: The goon deals an additional 2d6 precision damage to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} creatures.

oCNXpWiLMOxihZJI.description: This is a piece of stout wood shaped or repurposed to bludgeon an enemy. Clubs can be intricately carved pieces of martial art or as simple as a tree branch or piece of wood.
oCNXpWiLMOxihZJI.name: +1 Striking Club

4YTp0UYUC06RdaoE.description:
This plain silver ring has an almost oily sheen. While wearing the ring, you gain a +2 item bonus to Deception checks.

Activate D Interact

Effect Snapping your fingers on the hand that wears the ring causes the ring to cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.JyxTmqjYYn63V5LY]{Glibness} on you with no visual manifestations of a spell being cast.

YsaitQCNWkFcXQSi.description:
Activate 1 Interact

After you drink this mutagen, your body becomes thick and sturdy. You exhibit a healthy glow, though you tend to be ponderous and unobservant.

Benefit You gain a +3 item bonus to Fortitude saves and 30 temporary Hit Points. Whenever you are at maximum Hit Points for at least 1 full minute, you regain the temporary Hit Points. When you roll a success on a Fortitude save, you get a critical success instead.

Drawback You take a -2 penalty to Will saves, Perception checks and initiative rolls.

Duration 1 hour.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.Item.xLilBqqf34ZJYO9i]{Effect: Juggernaut Mutagen (Greater)}

ZJvsVjbPWteUphTK.description:
Requirements Berleth has just used his shovel to Trip a creature

Effect Berleth brutally brings his shovel down on the prone foe, making a shovel Strike. On a hit, the Strike deals damage as normal, plus the target must make a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:30] save.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 1}.

Failure The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 2}.

Critical Failure The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 2} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1} for 1 minute.
ZJvsVjbPWteUphTK.name: Concussive Beatdown

hozDdAMhO9qf2Buo.description:
Berleth plunges his shovel through a creature's neck as though it were peat moss.

He makes a shovel Strike against an adjacent @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Unconscious} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} creature. On a hit, the creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Yl48xTdMh3aeQYL2]{Wounded 2} (possibly @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.yZRUzMqrMmfLu0V1]{Dying}).
hozDdAMhO9qf2Buo.name: Decapitate

sTXhA6HFH3RVnqjV.description:
Frequency once per day

Trigger Berleth is reduced to 0 HP

Effect Berleth makes a final shovel Strike before dying.
sTXhA6HFH3RVnqjV.name: Final Blow

QgE3ujjsFZSthy7z.description:
Frequency once per day

Effect Blune calls into existence [[/r 1d4+2 #illusory copies]] illusory copies of himself, which dance around him and copy his every movement, making it almost impossible to pinpoint the true Blune.

Any attack that would hit Blune has a random chance of hitting an illusory copy instead. This effect lasts for up to 1 minute or until all the copies are destroyed or Blune is incapacitated.

Once a copy is hit, it's destroyed. If an attack roll fails to hit Blune's AC but doesn't critically fail, it destroys a copy but has no additional effect (even if the attack would normally have an effect on a failure). If an attack roll is a critical success and would hit a copy, the copy is destroyed and the attack roll becomes a success against Blune.

Once all the copies are destroyed, this ability ends.
QgE3ujjsFZSthy7z.name: Illusory Copies

VvH0EWE3C9hq7GdI.description:
@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.d6o52BnjViNz7Gub]{Prismatic Spray}

The end of this wand is forked instead of tapered.

Activate Cast a Spell; The activation takes 2 if the spell normally takes 1 to cast, or 3 if the spell normally take 2

Frequency Once per day, plus overcharge

Effect You Cast the Spell, and increase its area. Add 5 feet to the radius of a burst that normally has a radius of at least 10 feet; add 5 feet to the length of a cone or line that is normally 15 feet long or smaller; or add 10 feet to the length of a larger cone or line.

Craft Requirements Supply a casting of a spell of the appropriate level. The spell must have a casting time of 1 or 2, can't have a duration, and must have an area of burst (10 feet or more), cone, or line.
VvH0EWE3C9hq7GdI.name: Wand of Widening (7th-Level Prismatic Spray)

WQakf5K0a5EhkRkV.description: Blune deals an additional 4d6 precision damage to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} creatures.

flH3CHUzHXY7AFcz.description:
@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.8AMvNVOUEtxBCDvJ]{Monstrosity Form}

Casting a Spell from a scroll requires holding the scroll in one hand and activating it with a Cast a Spell activity using the normal number of actions for that spell.

To Cast a Spell from a scroll, the spell must appear on your spell list. Because you're the one Casting the Spell, use your spell attack roll and spell DC. The spell also gains the appropriate trait for your tradition (arcane, divine, occult, or primal).

Any physical material components and costs are provided when a scroll is created, so you don't need to provide them when Casting a Spell from a scroll. You must replace any required material component for that spell with a somatic component. If the spell requires a focus, you must have that focus to Cast the Spell from a scroll.
flH3CHUzHXY7AFcz.name: Scroll of Monstrosity Form (Level 8)

vFxSfT5XARA6xoPF.description:
This ring seems like simple tarnished brass, but it enhances your curiosity about traps and devices of all kinds.

You can use an Interact action to pull a set of thieves' tools from the ring. These tools appear in your hand and fold back into the ring if they would leave your possession.

They grant you a +3 item bonus to Thievery checks to Disable a Device and to Pick a Lock, and the ring's insights grant you the same bonus to Crafting checks to Craft and Repair snares and traps.

Activate 10 minutes (Interact)

Frequency once per day

Effect You create a 8th-level @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.o0l57UfBm9ScEUMW]{Glyph of Warding} containing your choice of either @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.d6o52BnjViNz7Gub]{Prismatic Spray} or 7th-level @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.sxQZ6yqTn0czJxVd]{Fireball}.

You can have only one glyph of warding from a ring of maniacal devices active at a time, even if you have multiple rings, and the spell ends if you lose your investiture in the ring.
vFxSfT5XARA6xoPF.name: Ring of Manical Devices (Greater) (Fireball)

2zo8BFj6mkav8MPT.description:
When an illusory toady is destroyed, it dissolves into a puddle of cerulean quintessence before reforming to quasi-life once more. One round after it is destroyed, the toady starts re-forming. One round after that, the toady is completely healed and begins to fight once more.

If damaged while it is re-forming but before the process is complete, the toady is destroyed but splits into two cerulean puddles that begin re-forming into two identical toadies 1 round later, each with half the maximum HP of the original toady (this is similar to an @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.Actor.uQBOJfjtzEXvpLQz]{Ochre Jelly's} Split ability); the toadies begin re-forming 1 round later.

The toadies are permanently destroyed only by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.ihbRf964JDXztcy3]{Disjunction} or if @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.agents-of-edgewatch-bestiary.Actor.sUrJ7jxzBiJTbwVo]{Blune} falls unconscious.
2zo8BFj6mkav8MPT.name: Ferocious Devotion

92BXBHbmRG68ifPd.description:
The toady wills itself to become a conduit for Blune's next spell, empowering the spell.

The toady becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} until the beginning of its next turn.

If Blune Bandersworth is within 30 feet and Casts a Spell before the toady's next turn, the spell travels through the toady before redirecting toward its intended target.

The spell is heightened by 1 level, to a maximum of 10th level. The toady is then destroyed.
92BXBHbmRG68ifPd.name: Amplify Spell

Boiling Fountains.description: Four pressure plates beneath the floorboards activate dragon-headed fountains on either side of the room, which spray boiling water across the area between them.
Boiling Fountains.hazardDisable: @Check[type:thievery|dc:21|name:Disable Pressure Plate|traits:action:disable-a-device] (trained) to disable each pressure plate, @Check[type:thievery|dc:16|name:Jam Fountain|traits:action:disable-a-device] to jam each fountain, or @Check[type:thievery|dc:18|name:Deflect Fountain's Spray|traits:action:disable-a-device] to deflect a fountain's spray
Boiling Fountains.hazardReset: Once a pressure plate has been activated, it must be reset manually.
Boiling Fountains.name: Boiling Fountains

Boiling Tub Trap.description: A snapped trip wire causes an alchemical bomb to detonate and blow up part of the tin tub, spilling boiling water all over the trap's victim.
Boiling Tub Trap.hazardDisable: @Check[type:thievery|dc:32|name:Remove Trip Wire|traits:action:disable-a-device] (master) to safely remove the trip wire from the bomb
Boiling Tub Trap.name: Boiling Tub Trap

nCwbF6k6DjALgFuy.description:
Requirements Bolar isn't fatigued or raging

Effect Bolar gains 3 temporary Hit Points that last until the rage ends. While raging, he deals 2 additional damage with melee attacks and takes a -1 penalty to AC. The rage lasts for 1 minute, until there are no enemies Bolar can perceive, or until Bolar falls unconscious.

Once the rage ends, Bolar can't Rage again for 1 minute.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.Item.z3uyCMBddrPK5umr]{Effect: Rage}
nCwbF6k6DjALgFuy.name: Rage

3BvCMBxHiHXEMq2P.description: A bone skipper swarm identifies bones and creatures with a skeletal system in the listed range.
3BvCMBxHiHXEMq2P.name: Bonesense (Imprecise) 30 feet

9LK5ORluncHekkZ5.description: Each enemy in the swarm's space takes @Damage[3d6[piercing]] damage (@Check[type:reflex|dc:24|basic:true]) save plus exposure to marrow rot.
9LK5ORluncHekkZ5.name: Swarming Bites

ofiTdcCz7bSlRXmy.description:
Marrow rot affects only creatures with a skeletal system

Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:24]

Onset 1 day

Stage 1 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 1} (1 day)

Stage 2 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 2} (1 day)

Stage 3 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 2} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 1} (1 day)
ofiTdcCz7bSlRXmy.name: Marrow Rot

CBZ2xBopPRbaMVV0.description: The bregdi tries to capsize an adjacent aquatic vessel of its size or smaller. It must succeed at an Athletics check with a DC of 35 (reduced by 5 for each size smaller the vessel is than the bregdi) or the pilot's Sailing Lore DC, whichever is higher.
CBZ2xBopPRbaMVV0.name: Capsize

Ht4guo51Eky0gFrz.description: The bregdi can breathe air for up to 10 minutes, or up to an hour so long as its skin remains wet.
Ht4guo51Eky0gFrz.name: Partial Amphibian

ObuiuOqfP6nhvs9S.description:
The bregdi pulls a creature it can reach or a creature holding something it can reach (such as a fishing line in the water).

The bregdi attempts an @Check[type:athletics|defense:fortitude] check against the creature's Fortitude DC. On a success, it pulls the creature into an adjacent space. On a critical success, the bregdi can also make a jaws Strike against the creature pulled into an adjacent space.
ObuiuOqfP6nhvs9S.name: Tug

Burning Chandelier Trap.description: Four large flaming chandeliers swing wildly around the room.
Burning Chandelier Trap.hazardDisable: @Check[type:thievery|dc:36|name:Disable a Chandelier|traits:action:disable-a-device] (master) to disable a chandelier or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{Dispel Magic} (8th level; counteract DC 33) to permanently drain the magic from a chandelier. Any amount of cold damage that overcomes a chandelier's cold resistance extinguishes its flames and removes its persistent fire damage and flame dart attack. @Check[type:thievery|dc:41|name:Disable Trap (Control Panel)|traits:action:disable-a-device] (legendary) to disable the entire trap from the hidden control panel in the southeast corner of the room.
Burning Chandelier Trap.hazardReset: The trap deactivates and resets 1 minute after there are no living creatures remaining in the room.
Burning Chandelier Trap.hazardRoutine: (4 actions) For every chandelier disabled, the trap's actions are reduced by 1. For each of the trap's actions, a different chandelier attacks a random creature in the room. A chandelier uses its swinging chandelier attack if it can, but it can't make melee attacks against creatures in the cage, the closet, or the gap between the two double doors leading into the vault. Against a creature it can't reach with a melee attack, it uses a flame dart attack instead. The trap doesn't take multiple attack penalties.
Burning Chandelier Trap.name: Burning Chandelier Trap

034N8wrms1VjpEX4.description:
Trigger A living creature within 30 feet is reduced to 0 Hit Points

Effect Calennia targets the creature with a death knell spell (DC 34). If the target dies, all of Calennia's enemies within 60 feet are targeted by a fear spell (DC 34). A creature that succeeds at either save is temporarily immune to this ability for 24 hours.
034N8wrms1VjpEX4.name: Terrible Justice

745PY8vNnU4dRB3J.description: When making a Recall Knowledge check about a devil she's observing, whenever Calennia rolls a critical failure, she gets a failure instead.
745PY8vNnU4dRB3J.name: Diabolic Certitude

9TY6byP3620OyD3n.description: Few armors in the Inner Sea region are as memorable as the iconic Hellknight plate. While each order has its own flourishes, Hellknight plate is instantly recognizable to any who know of the Hellknights. Hellknights go to extreme measures to punish non-Hellknights who get their hands on Hellknight plate, and the reward is not usually worth the risk, since for non-Hellknights, the armor is functionally similar to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Gq1cZWSKOtJhKd2p]{Full Plate}.
9TY6byP3620OyD3n.name: +2 Resilient Hellknight Plate

AuIi30v2cCwEK9Oy.description: Calennia Strikes with her scourge. On a hit, she rolls damage three times. This damage is combined (for the purpose of overcoming damage resistance, for example).
AuIi30v2cCwEK9Oy.name: Flog Mercilessly

ZfMUXnwfQvzxGYlX.description: This large crossbow is harder to load and more substantial than a regular crossbow, but it packs a greater punch.
ZfMUXnwfQvzxGYlX.name: +1 Striking Heavy Crossbow

sCeV7i5ftZVT9d83.description: A scourge-also known as a cat-o'-nine-tails-is a set of several knotted cords made from cotton or leather and attached to a handle. While most scourges are more suitable for torture than combat, the weapons used by the Order of the Scourge have metal barbs woven in to pierce clothing and armor. The scourge is a martial melee weapon.
sCeV7i5ftZVT9d83.name: +2 Greater Striking axiomatic Scourge

0tydSelE4MWNlyip.name: Project Image (At Will) (See Project False Image)

Ctkj7r3YYAFSQEKx.description:
The camarach vomits a spray of coruscating light. This has the effect of a DC 42 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.d6o52BnjViNz7Gub]{Prismatic Spray}, except that each creature is affected by one violet beam and one other beam (roll 1d6 instead of 1d8 to determine which other beam).

The camarach can't Disgorge a Portal again for [[/br 1d4 #Recharge Disgorge a Portal]]{1d4 rounds}.
Ctkj7r3YYAFSQEKx.name: Disgorge Portal

LvmDMsbTpm0IyK9u.description:
Trigger The camarach Grabs a creature

Effect The camarach uses Swallow Whole.
LvmDMsbTpm0IyK9u.name: Fast Swallow

nurJkCpZvHiPZo76.description: When the camarach casts project image, its illusory image can be another creature of its size or a structure of its size that features a large portal (such as a freestanding archway or a large hut with an open doorway).
nurJkCpZvHiPZo76.name: Project False Image

wjucZTZEvK64kwlz.description:
The camarach shunts one creature within its body through an inner portal to send it away.

The target must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:38] save.

Critical Success The creature is teleported to an open space it chooses within 30 feet of the camarach.

Success The creature isn't teleported.

Failure The creature is teleported to a random open space 1 mile from the camarach.

Critical Failure The creature is teleported to a random other plane, as @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.5bTt2CvYHPvaR7QQ]{Plane Shift}.
wjucZTZEvK64kwlz.name: Exile

Canopy Drop.description: A trapdoor, connected to floor sensors, opens in the section of floor marked on the map, while the surrounding floor suddenly tilts to a 45-degree angle and the fountains in the wall begin spraying at high pressure, making the tile slippery and pushing creatures toward the open chute.
Canopy Drop.hazardDisable: @Check[type:thievery|dc:23|name:Jam Trapdoor Mechanism|traits:action:disable-a-device] (expert) to jam the mechanisms and keep the trapdoor from opening, or to locate the bypass switch hidden under a stair riser just outside the room
Canopy Drop.name: Canopy Drop

Carvey.description: Made of odd scraps of skin and muscle, a flesh golem is a grotesque parody of life. Though it has no mind, it can still go into a berserk rage when harmed, giving it a faint semblance of emotion. Flesh golems guard the laboratories and charnel houses of fleshwarpers and necromancers who feel no compunctions about desecrating corpses for their own ends. Though the first flesh golem is believed to have been a misguided attempt to create from simple base elements, these monstrosities are far from human. In isolated cases, echoes of a personality might rise in a flesh golem if the brain used as part of its construction belonged to a particularly powerful personality, but such tragic instances are rare in the extreme.

95kvqPPSJNio8vAK.description:
A severely damaged flesh golem has a chance of going berserk.

If it has 40 or fewer HP at the start of its turn, the golem must succeed at a @Check[type:flat|dc:5] check or go berserk. A berserk golem wildly attacks the nearest living creature, or the nearest object if no creatures are nearby.
95kvqPPSJNio8vAK.name: Berserk

Hss992fc1sCOcDVo.description:
Trigger The golem takes electricity damage and a creature is adjacent to it.

Effect The golem lashes out and tries to grab a nearby creature. The golem attempts an Athletics check to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.PMbdMWc2QroouFGD]{Grapple} an adjacent creature. The creature also takes @Damage[3d6[electricity]] damage on a success, or @Damage[6d6[electricity]] damage on a critical success.
Hss992fc1sCOcDVo.name: Electric Reflexes

Q4P1CH4AQAlYpZ0X.description:
harmed by fire ([[/r 5d8]], [[/r 3d4]] from areas or persistent damage); healed by electricity (area [[/r 2d4[healing]]] Hit Points); slowed by cold

A golem is immune to spells and magical abilities other than its own, but each type of golem is affected by a few types of magic in special ways. If an entry lists multiple types (such as "cold and water"), either type of spell can affect the golem.

Harmed By Any magic of this type that targets the golem causes it to take the listed amount of damage (this damage has no type) instead of the usual effect. If the golem starts its turn in an area of magic of this type or is affected by a persistent effect of the appropriate type, it takes the damage listed in the parenthetical.

Healed By Any magic of this type that targets the golem makes the golem lose the slowed condition and gain HP equal to half the damage the spell would have dealt. If the golem starts its turn in an area of this type of magic, it gains the HP listed in the parenthetical.

Slowed By Any magic of this type that targets the golem causes it to be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} for [[/br 2d6 #rounds]]{2d6 rounds} instead of the usual effect. If the golem starts its turn in an area of this type of magic, it's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} for that round.

Vulnerable To Each golem is vulnerable to one or more specific spells, with the effects described in its stat block.
Q4P1CH4AQAlYpZ0X.name: Golem Antimagic

X7yV3UIdROaskajA.description:
Carvey is unerringly loyal to the Skinsaw cult and to Mobana especially. When Carvey goes berserk, she doesn't attack the nearest living creature or object but instead moves adjacent to the creature nearest the balcony (or similar falling hazard, if the battle is taking place elsewhere) and attempts to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Shove} the creature over the cliff's edge.

The number of feet Carvey can Shove a creature is doubled as long as Carvey has 40 or fewer HP (thus, she pushes a creature 10 feet on a sucessful check and 20 feet on a critical success), but she must move the same distance and in the same direction as the pushed creature.

If the shoved creature falls over the cliff's edge, so does Carvey.
X7yV3UIdROaskajA.name: Suicidal Obedience

hvTnI184eIoLfwPq.description:
Requirement The flesh golem is berserk.

Effect The flesh golem Strikes with its fist at a -1 circumstance penalty. If it hits, it deals [[/r 1d6]] extra damage and knocks the target @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}.
hvTnI184eIoLfwPq.name: Berserk Slam

uzwUjI3gD8tO8Chh.description: Casting a flesh to stone spell on the flesh golem affects the golem normally.
uzwUjI3gD8tO8Chh.name: Vulnerable to Flesh to Stone

Carvey.name: Carvey

IcNV9BTE0VD3ZNXy.description:
The casino bouncer attempts to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.action-macros.Macro.nEwqNNWX6scLt4sc]{Demoralize} a creature with a mere glance. The casino bouncer doesn't take a penalty to their Intimidation check if the target doesn't speak the same language.

If the bouncer rolls a critical success, the target can't reduce the value of its frightened condition until [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds} have passed.
IcNV9BTE0VD3ZNXy.name: Intimidating Stare

OpV99ABQlIY3FF4G.description:
Requirements The casino bouncer has Grabbed a Medium or smaller target and is wielding a nonlethal weapon in the other hand

Effect The casino bouncer makes a Strike against the grabbed target with the nonlethal weapon. If the Strike hits, it deals damage as usual and the casino bouncer moves the target 5 feet (this is forced movement) and Steps into the space the target had just occupied.
OpV99ABQlIY3FF4G.name: Escort from the Premises

Chalky.description: This golem is a walking alchemical nightmare capable of inflicting all manner of painful wounds. Its ability to follow orders is granted by the otherwise mindless humanoid brain that floats in its dome-like head. In exceptionally rare cases, the brain used in its creation might retain fragments of memories or even actual intellect, resulting in an alchemical golem with a personality and agenda of its own.

10AhR44dLRwNyyyT.description:
When an alchemical golem takes physical damage from a critical hit or is affected by a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.1xbFBQDRs0hT5xZ9]{Shatter} spell, one glass chamber within its body shatters, spewing alchemical liquid in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:5].

Roll on the alchemical chambers list to determine which one shatters - all creatures within a @Template[type:emanation|distance:5] are affected by the elixir in the randomly rolled alchemical chamber, and these creatures may forego their Reflex saves against the effect if they wish.
10AhR44dLRwNyyyT.name: Alchemical Rupture

8ubCXo0Jx35U5xxc.description:
harmed by sonic ([[/r 5d8]], [[/r 2d6]] from areas or persistent damage); healed by acid (area [[/r 2d4[healing]]] Hit Points); slowed by cold

A golem is immune to spells and magical abilities other than its own, but each type of golem is affected by a few types of magic in special ways. If an entry lists multiple types (such as cold and water), either type of spell can affect the golem.

Harmed By Any magic of this type that targets the golem causes it to take the listed amount of damage (this damage has no type) instead of the usual effect. If the golem starts its turn in an area of magic of this type or is affected by a persistent effect of the appropriate type, it takes the damage listed in the parenthetical.

Healed By Any magic of this type that targets the golem makes the golem lose the slowed condition and gain HP equal to half the damage the spell would have dealt. If the golem starts its turn in an area of this type of magic, it gains the HP listed in the parenthetical.

Slowed By Any magic of this type that targets the golem causes it to be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} for [[/br 2d6 #rounds]]{2d6 rounds} instead of the usual effect. If the golem starts its turn in an area of this type of magic, it's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} for that round.

Vulnerable To Each golem is vulnerable to one or more specific spells, with the effects described in its stat block.
8ubCXo0Jx35U5xxc.name: Golem Antimagic

LPMvePNhEQEvIeA1.description:
When an alchemical golem hits a creature with a syringe Strike, roll 1d6 on the alchemical chambers list to determine the additional effect of the attack.

Chalky's alchemical chambers are filled with helpful potions and elixirs rather than harmful substances. When Chalky targets an ally with its syringe Strike, the ally takes no damage and doesn't need to make a save against the rolled effect.
LPMvePNhEQEvIeA1.name: Alchemical Injection

LYl3vW92ci5HFVXk.description:
An alchemical golem's body contains six alchemical chambers filled with different substances. When an alchemical golem ability calls upon a randomly determined alchemical effect, roll 1d6 and consult the following :

[[/br 1d6 #Alchemical Effect]] Alchemical Effect
1

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.TZUskLT7yvP7N2co]{Elixir of Life (Lesser)}
2 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.T4ouD4mVFHA3EHs6]{Bomber's Eye Elixir (Lesser)}
3 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.oCuwJ9IUDAuzsUwa]{Bravo's Brew (Moderate)}
4 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.bQPRKEpnLakJBAAh]{Cat's Eye Elixir}
5 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.AqLxu3ir4UGzdOaz]{Cheetah's Elixir (Moderate)}
6 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.TMtQnY6yvIRCpK9v]{Juggernaut Mutagen (Greater)}
LYl3vW92ci5HFVXk.name: Alchemical Chambers

sbYDSGZlPbw5odWZ.description: Casting a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.1xbFBQDRs0hT5xZ9]{Shatter} spell on an alchemical golem affects the golem normally, but also causes an alchemical rupture.
sbYDSGZlPbw5odWZ.name: Vulnerable to Shatter

Chalky.name: Chalky

1HjWqCIXUjmknlZE.description: Chaos Gulgamodh's bodyincluding the appendages it uses to make melee Strikesis made of adamantine.
1HjWqCIXUjmknlZE.name: Adamantine Strikes

268BBCle1rCc1g1d.description:
Chaos Gulgamodh unleashes a salvo of explosive blasts in a @Template[type:cone|distance:30]. Creatures in the area take @Damage[(10d10+20)[fire]] damage (@Check[type:reflex|dc:43|basic:true] save).

On a failed save, a creature is subjected to a @RollTable[cBHMpmeIhoBdUyQT]{Warpwave} effect. On a critically failed save, a creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 1}.

Chaos Gulgamodh can't use Cannon Fusillade again for [[/br 1d4 #Recharge Cannon Fusillade]]{1d4 rounds}.
268BBCle1rCc1g1d.name: Cannon Fusillade

EaBeGYjdT1VVqvT6.description: When a child of venom is hit by an attack that would deal slashing or piercing damage and the child of venom has at least 20 HP, the creature splits into two identical children of venom with half the original's HP. One child of venom is in the same space as the original, and the other appears in an adjacent unoccupied space. If no adjacent space is unoccupied, they automatically push creatures and objects out of the way to fill a space.
EaBeGYjdT1VVqvT6.name: Split

aLH0uLhIjacpKBNC.description: The child of venom deals an additional 3d6 precision damage to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} creatures.

at6MabtHqhZPINQ3.description: The child of venom can climb on ceilings and other inverted surfaces, though such surfaces are difficult terrain for them.
at6MabtHqhZPINQ3.name: Suction

mfewT8MWlHlBhBXV.description: These blades come in a variety of shapes and styles, but they are typically 2 feet long.
mfewT8MWlHlBhBXV.name: +1 Striking Shortsword

Wbny5fScmVtKCw6w.description:
Frequency once per round

The clockwork amalgam becomes a blur of spinning weaponry. It makes up to five melee Strikes (one for each active melee attack it has available), taking a -4 penalty to the attack roll for each attack, but ignoring the multiple attack penalty until it has made all of its attacks. It can use each melee attack only once and it can target each creature in reach only once. If the clockwork amalgam used Whirring Doom in the previous round, it can use it again this round using only 1 action instead of 3. The amalgam's movement Speed is halved until the end of its next turn.
Wbny5fScmVtKCw6w.name: Whirring Doom

eosKGTfGo3nA3EVl.description: The clockwork amalgam can recalibrate its internal structure to shed damaged components and replace them with new ones, restoring 125 HP to the construct. Each time it uses this ability, the clockwork amalgam permanently deactivates one of its five melee attacks as the components from that arm reassemble within the core of the machine.
eosKGTfGo3nA3EVl.name: Recalibrate

pEr8VvYetu8yNn5t.description:
For the clockwork amalgam to act, it must be wound with a unique key by another creature. This takes 1 minute. Once wound, it remains operational for 7 days, after which time it becomes unaware of its surroundings and can't act until it's wound again.

The amalgam can enter standby mode as a 3-action activity. Its operational time doesn't decrease in standby, but it can sense its surroundings (with a -2 penalty to Perception). It can't act, with one exception: when it perceives a creature, it can exit standby as a reaction (rolling initiative if appropriate).

A creature can attempt a @Check[type:thievery|dc:33|name:Wind Down|traits:manipulate,action:disable-a-device] check to Disable a Device to wind the amalgam down. For each success, the assassin loses 1 hour of operational time. This can be done even if the amalgam is in standby mode.
pEr8VvYetu8yNn5t.name: Efficient Winding

Clockwork Arms.description: Four claw-tipped clockwork arms suspended from the ceiling pick up and deposit creatures into a nearby hatch.
Clockwork Arms.hazardDisable: @Check[type:thievery|dc:43|name:Deactivate One Arm|traits:action:disable-a-device] (master) to jam and deactivate one of the arms or @Check[type:athletics|dc:46|name:Tear Arm Off Machine] (legendary) to tear an arm off the machine.
Clockwork Arms.hazardRoutine: (4 actions) The trap loses 1 action per arm destroyed or disabled. On its turn, the trap makes claw Strikes against creatures other than the Rumormonger or the Inkmaster. If an arm already has a creature grabbed, the trap spends 2 actions to use its Open Hatch ability.
Clockwork Arms.name: Clockwork Arms

A7VgvFTQFpm1Cc79.description: The clockwork assassin launches a smoke bomb. A screen of thick, opaque smoke fills a @Template[type:burst|distance:10] within 60 feet of the clockwork assassin. Creatures within the area are concealed, and all other creatures are concealed to them. The smoke lasts for 1 minute or until dispersed by a strong wind.
A7VgvFTQFpm1Cc79.name: Smoke Bomb Launcher

GtoDWNmX34925xMc.description: Creatures hit by the clockwork assassin's rapier hand Strike are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} until the start of the clockwork assassin's next turn.
GtoDWNmX34925xMc.name: Unbalancing Blow

OF6N85WER1HxJgCK.description: A projectile launcher is integrated into a clockwork assassin's systems, containing 10 spinning blades and five smoke bombs. When the assassin is destroyed, the launcher and its ammunition are also destroyed.
OF6N85WER1HxJgCK.name: Integrated Launcher

R1OmPKgnrpEPWGr6.description:
Trigger A creature within the monster's reach uses a manipulate action or a move action, makes a ranged attack, or leaves a square during a move action it's using.

Effect The monster attempts a melee Strike against the triggering creature. If the attack is a critical hit and the trigger was a manipulate action, the monster disrupts that action. This Strike doesn't count toward the monster's multiple attack penalty, and its multiple attack penalty doesn't apply to this Strike.
R1OmPKgnrpEPWGr6.name: Attack of Opportunity

Y7P7UpMZajGcxNz4.description: The clockwork assassin's Strikes deal an additional 3d6 precision damage to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} creatures.
Y7P7UpMZajGcxNz4.name: Sneak Attack

mmdbAeOOVVjLALCx.description: The clockwork assassin spends 1 hour of its operational time to repair itself, regaining 25 Hit Points and refilling its integrated projectile launcher with 4 spinning blades (to a maximum of 10) and 2 smoke bombs (to a maximum of 5).
mmdbAeOOVVjLALCx.name: Rapid Repair

The assassin can enter standby mode as a 3-action activity. Its operational time doesn't decrease in standby, but it can sense its surroundings (with a -2 penalty to Perception). It can't act, with one exception: when it perceives a creature, it can exit standby as a reaction (rolling initiative if appropriate).A creature can attempt a @Check[type:thievery|dc:31|name:Wind Down|traits:manipulate,action:disable-a-device] check to Disable a Device to wind the assassin down. For each success, the assassin loses 1 hour of operational time. This can be done even if the assassin is in standby mode.
q4WljID3qrZ5Fpnr.name: Wind-Up

yOvz4I15CCPk78ns.description: The clockwork assassin ignores the concealed condition from smoke.
yOvz4I15CCPk78ns.name: Smoke Vision

5HdfiD2BmZU6LzvL.description: The chopper makes a melee Strike against each enemy within melee reach. Its multiple attack penalty doesn't increase until after all the attacks.
5HdfiD2BmZU6LzvL.name: Whirlwind Strike

Clockwork Poison Bomb.description: A clockwork bomb releases gouts of poisonous smoke. The smoke issues forth from a single nozzle attached to two tanks of pressurized poison
Clockwork Poison Bomb.hazardDisable: Three @Check[type:thievery|dc:31|name:Disable a Latch|traits:action:disable-a-device] (expert) checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.cYdz2grcOcRt4jk6]{Disable a Device} to disable the latches that lock the nozzle in place, then one @Check[type:thievery|dc:35|name:Turn Off Nozzle|traits:action:disable-a-device] (master) check to Disable a Device to turn off the nozzle; DCs decrease by 2 if Oggvurm is immobilized, paralyzed, unconscious, or dead
Clockwork Poison Bomb.hazardReset: The trap issues smoke for 3 minutes before its tanks run dry. The tanks must be replaced before the bomb can be reactivated.
Clockwork Poison Bomb.hazardRoutine: (1 action) On its turn, the bomb spews forth a smoky gout of airborne @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.WvDbdESFJY6Be2u1]{Blackfinger Blight} poison. The cloud fills a 20-foot radius, or a 10-foot radius if only one tank remains intact. If the bomb is already in the center of a blackfinger blight cloud, the radius of that cloud increases by 20 feet (or 10 feet, if only one tank remains intact) instead.
Clockwork Poison Bomb.name: Clockwork Poison Bomb

26ZZztmP0cFmWp6x.description:
The cobbleswarm's tremorsense is a precise sense out to 40 feet and an imprecise sense out to 80 feet. The cobbleswarm can't sense anything beyond the range of its tremorsense.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.Tremorsense]
26ZZztmP0cFmWp6x.name: Precise Tremorsense 40 feet

S00gbcUTroHxccVJ.description: Each enemy in the cobbleswarm's space takes @Damage[2d4[bludgeoning]] damage (@Check[type:reflex|dc:17|basic:true] save).
S00gbcUTroHxccVJ.name: Pummeling Assault

TBb2TTPl5fRKJQJU.description:
The cobbleswarm attempts an @Check[type:athletics] check and compares the result to the Fortitude DC of all creatures in its space.

Critical Success The creature falls @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone} and takes @Damage[1d6[bludgeoning]] damage, and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Restrained} by the cobbleswarm until the end of the cobbleswarm's next turn.

Success The creature falls prone, and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed} by the cobbleswarm until the creature until the end of the cobbleswarm's next turn.
TBb2TTPl5fRKJQJU.name: Grasping Bites

0DxZM2ZhwpKrUolW.description: The Copper Hand illusionist deals 2d6 additional precision damage to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} creatures.

31SjrOIjFWX8if4N.description: The rogue applies one of their black adder venom poisons to their wielded weapon. If their next attack with that weapon before the end of their next turn hits and deals damage, the target is afflicted with the poison.
31SjrOIjFWX8if4N.name: Poison Weapon

YY5ytAHtfhcxwxto.description: The Copper Hand rogue deals 1d6 additional precision damage to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} creatures.

mdqTsawy6o4sNLqp.description:
Trigger A creature targets the Copper Hand rogue with an attack, and the rogue can see the attacker

Effect The rogue dodges out of the way, gaining a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack.
mdqTsawy6o4sNLqp.name: Nimble Dodge

zJEYT9EyVtZRQ3Jx.description:
Adder venom is a simple but effective way to enhance a weapon.

Activate 2 Interact (Injury)

Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:18]

Maximum Duration 3 rounds

Stage 1 @Damage[1d8[poison]] damage (1 round)

Stage 2 @Damage[1d10[poison]] damage (1 round)

Stage 3 @Damage[2d6[poison]] damage (1 round)

CU5CXS5c5trwAd9g.description: If a reaction would disrupt the Daemonic Infector's spellcasting action, he attempts a @Check[type:flat|dc:15] check. On a success, the action isn't disrupted.
CU5CXS5c5trwAd9g.name: Steady Spellcasting

Ez5LQ3xID56lShet.description: The Daemonic targets a creature within 30 feet that's currently subject to a poison affliction. The poison affliction progresses to the next stage.
Ez5LQ3xID56lShet.name: Infector

k1KchqR9i8uSyT6e.description: The first time each round that the Daemonic Infector takes fire damage, his fumes combust, dealing @Damage[30[fire]] damage to all other creatures within the area of his toxic fumes aura.
k1KchqR9i8uSyT6e.name: Combustible

uXNPc5LpmbvMlOa5.description:
The Daemonic Infector exhales a @Template[type:line|distance:30] of concentrated fumes.

Each creature in the area takes @Damage[12d10[poison]] damage (@Check[type:fortitude|dc:44|basic:true] save; on a critical failure the creature is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 1}).

The Infector can't Breathe Death again for [[/br 1d4 #Recharge Breathe Death]]{1d4 rounds}.
uXNPc5LpmbvMlOa5.name: Breathe Death

zchaebxlIBynZinm.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:10]{10 feet} @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Item.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{Aura}

A creature that enters or begins its turn within the aura must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:44] save.

On a failed save, the creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 1}, and on a critical failure, it's also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1} for 1 minute. In addition, creatures within the aura attempting a flat check to remove @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Poison Damage} must roll twice and take the lower result.
zchaebxlIBynZinm.name: Toxic Fumes

6u1eMdIQZV0dWPQU.description:
Trigger A creature critically fails a Strike against the Daemonic Rumormonger

Effect The Rumormonger dodges out of the way and uses his momentum to attack and move out of reach. He Strides up to 20 feet and can Strike at any point during this movement; this Strike counts toward the multiple attack penalty on his next turn.
6u1eMdIQZV0dWPQU.name: Opportune Dodge

a5d4jfdl2s8CiAsa.description:
The Daemonic Rumormonger breathes a torrent of acidic sand and poisoned ink in an @Template[type:line|distance:80], dealing @Damage[6d12[acid]] damage and @Damage[6d12[poison]] damage and exposing victims to his black ink delirium.

He can't use Breath of Lies again for [[/br 1d4 #Recharge Breath of Lies]]{1d4 rounds}.
a5d4jfdl2s8CiAsa.name: Breath of Lies

qFILNq2kmX5xF0Dt.description:
Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:38]

Maximum Duration 4 rounds

Stage 1 @Damage[3d6[poison]] damage and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 2} (1 round)

Stage 2 @Damage[6d6[poison]] damage and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{Confused} (1 round)
qFILNq2kmX5xF0Dt.name: Black Ink Delirium

rZ6LtOq5W7Ef8R1W.description: The Daemonic Rumormonger Strides up to his Speed. He can make up to three claw Strikes, each against a different target, at any points during this Stride. His multiple attack penalty applies as usual.
rZ6LtOq5W7Ef8R1W.name: Whirling Slashes

1h5CBWyXY0MAHGtm.description: Any creature taking @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Bleed Damage} is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} against the Daemonic Skinner's attacks. When attacking an off-guard creature, the Skinner deals an additional 2d6 precision damage.
1h5CBWyXY0MAHGtm.name: Bloody Sneak Attack

IEuErW2Q6KaGlk21.description:
Requirements The Daemonic Skinner has a creature grabbed with her blood chain or a creature is affected by her bloody chain aura

Effect The Skinner pulls the creature into the nearest open adjacent square and makes a cleaver Strike against the creature.
IEuErW2Q6KaGlk21.name: Hook and Flay

cdoPISuZdSbxOwT1.description:
Trigger A creature taking @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Bleed Damage} within 30 feet of the Daemonic Skinner Casts a Spell with a verbal component or speaks

Effect The Skinner wills the triggering creature's blood to gush from their mouth and constrict their throat. The target's spell is disrupted.

The target must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:47] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 2}.
cdoPISuZdSbxOwT1.name: Spell Choke

kfZVz80JupwQ5DE1.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:20]{20 feet} @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Item.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{Aura}

Chains of blood bind a bleeding creature to the Daemonic Skinner.

Creatures in range that are taking @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Bleed Damage} can't move out of the aura.

The Skinner can have only one aura active at a time.

She can switch her active aura as an Interact action.
kfZVz80JupwQ5DE1.name: Bloody Chain Aura

rJu8a6w24iFChezA.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:30]{30 feet} @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Item.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{Aura}

Any time a creature in the aura takes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Bleed Damage}, the Daemonic Skinner regains the same number of Hit Points as the damage dealt.

The Skinner can have only one aura active at a time.

She can switch her active aura as an Interact action.
rJu8a6w24iFChezA.name: Transfusion Aura

Dart Barrage.description: Four dart-loaded pipes hidden in the diagonal walls are connected to a pressure plate under the brass seal in the room's center.
Dart Barrage.hazardDisable: @Check[type:thievery|dc:22|name:Disable Pressure Plate|traits:action:disable-a-device] (trained) to disable the pressure plate, or four @Check[type:thievery|dc:18|name:Plug Dart Launcher|traits:action:disable-a-device] (trained) checks to plug the dart launchers
Dart Barrage.hazardReset: The trap runs out of darts after 4 rounds of firing and must be reset manually by dismantling the walls to reload the launchers. If at any point there are no longer more than two creatures placing weight on the floor, the trap ceases firing but remains armed, ready to resume firing its remaining darts once triggered again.
Dart Barrage.hazardRoutine: (4 actions) The trap loses 1 action for each disabled launcher. On each of the trap's actions, it fires one dart at a creature in the center of the room.
Dart Barrage.name: Dart Barrage

2FxUvyDjnESqE9bl.description:
Requirements The chemist has their alchemist's tools, formula book, and a free hand

Effect The chemist creates a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.SgtqZxt26BdjUmEB]{Moderate Acid Flask} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.gWr4q4HiyGhETA8H]{Alchemist's Fire} that they must use before the end of their next turn or else it becomes inert.
2FxUvyDjnESqE9bl.name: Quick Brew

FnOoWUqsRQWlwgHs.description: This mobile collection of vials and chemicals can be used for simple alchemical tasks.

f6aAjLfElEhbsLCC.description:
Requirements The chemist has at least one bomb in their possession

Effect The chemist adds a hasty mix of noxious substances to the bomb and makes a ranged Strike with it. If it hits and deals damage, the target must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:27] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 2} for [[/br 1d6 #rounds]]{1d6 rounds}; if the result of the save is a critical failure, this increases to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 3}. For the next 24 hours, the affected target takes a -2 circumstance penalty (-3 on a critical failure) to additional Fortitude saving throws against the same chemist's Crude Bombs.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.Item.5ZK22sNW7o26aST0]{Effect: Dirty Bomb}

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.Item.ryY6fdqpC5Ztnagd]{Effect: Dirty Bomb (Critical Failure)}
f6aAjLfElEhbsLCC.name: Dirty Bomb

NDjY88hxyNPqDwPf.description: The Diobel Sweeper tough Interacts to draw a bomb, then Strikes with it.
NDjY88hxyNPqDwPf.name: Quick Bomber

ZbNsjTdTl9JRvGxk.description: Whenever the gang tough makes a successful melee Strike against a frightened creature, the Strike deals an extra weapon die of damage.
ZbNsjTdTl9JRvGxk.name: Bullyrag Beatdown

aZvRC9a03MwZf7rr.description: When the gang tough's Strike with a bludgeoning weapon is a critical hit and deals damage, the target becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1}.
aZvRC9a03MwZf7rr.name: Frightening Critical

sjXOUlhh7Alii1i5.description:
Mystic patterns create a magic reservoir within this ammunition. You activate spellstrike ammunition by Casting a Spell into the ammunition. The spell must be of a spell level the ammunition can hold, and the spell must be able to target a creature other than the caster. A creature hit by activated spellstrike ammunition is targeted by the spell. If the creature isn't a valid target for the spell, the spell is lost.

The ammunition affects only the target hit, even if the spell would normally affect more than one target.
