This effect lasts until the creature spends a single action to tear out the stitching, which deals @Damage[1d6[piercing]] damage to it.

Critical Failure The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 2}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 2}, or off-guard (seamer's choice). This effect lasts until the creature spends 2 actions to tear out the stitching, which deals @Damage[2d6[piercing]] damage to it.
MvGg9ZU03PHCDYj9.name: Quick Stitch

iccpDuEAwMrtLyBh.description:
Every Skinsaw seamer keeps a sewing needle attached to a loop of thick silk, wrapped loosely around their hand not holding a weapon, which they can use in combat to snag or disarm attackers

Trigger A creature hits the seamer with a melee Strike

Effect The seamer attempts an Athletics check to either @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.action-macros.Macro.i95kcGLIQKOTsnv6]{Grapple} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.action-macros.Macro.ooiO59Ch2QaebOmc]{Disarm} the triggering creature.
iccpDuEAwMrtLyBh.name: Wire Catch

p777SbqGil3xrtzd.description:
Requirements The Skinsaw seamer dealt damage with a melee weapon other than its war razor with their last action

Effect The seamer makes a war razor Strike against the same creature that they just damaged. On a hit, the seamer slices a strip of flesh from the target and deals @Damage[1d6[bleed]] in addition to the war razor's usual damage.
p777SbqGil3xrtzd.name: Flay

xRY1qziaBS6g3k0w.description:
A patchwork of humanoid flesh makes up this grotesque mask stitched together with black silk or wire. It is distinctive for its bulbous orange eye- crafted from a magical glass bauble-and wide row of teeth.

When worn, the mask amplifies your ability to sense fear in other creatures.

You automatically know the value of the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened} condition of any @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.1wQY3JYyhMYeeV2G]{Observed} creature, and you gain a +1 item bonus to Perception checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{Seek} frightened creatures. Whenever you deal precision damage to a frightened creature, you deal 1 additional precision damage.

If you are not evil, you are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 2} while wearing theSkinsaw mask.

0yo458L980s9JXH6.description:
The rotting hides and molding straw stuffing of skitterstitches are ideal nesting grounds for vermin and insect swarms. Any animal swarm sharing a space with a skitterstitch gains fast healing 3.

Additionally, if a creature deals at least 10 piercing or slashing damage to the skitterstitchstitch, the swarm can use its swarming bites Strike (or similar attack) against the attacker as a reaction.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.Item.CM14G9kLI97aIC5h]{Effect: Pest Haven}
0yo458L980s9JXH6.name: Pest Haven

EWsYBE6UDRYE7p46.description:
Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:23|traits:poison]

Maximum Duration 6 rounds

Stage 1 @Damage[1d10[poison]] damage, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard}, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 1} (1 round)

Stage 2 @Damage[1d10[poison]] damage, off-guard, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{Clumsy 2} (1 round)
EWsYBE6UDRYE7p46.name: Skitterstitch Venom

HHDLYWqh0LHr49Uu.description:
Requirements The skitterstitch hasn't used this ability since the last time it successfully used its Flay ability

Effect The skitterstitch sews flayed flesh to its body to seal tears and rents. The skitterstitch regains [[/r 8[healing]]]{8 Hit Points}.
HHDLYWqh0LHr49Uu.name: Stitch Skin

S8lzbxGXfumHXYYq.description: The skitterstitch makes a blade Strike against an animal or humanoid. On a success, the skitterstitch slices a long strip of flesh from the target; if the skitterstitch dealt damage, it deals an additional 1d6 persistent bleed damage.
S8lzbxGXfumHXYYq.name: Flay

iJUSlDT7ZVFtjNSy.description: Skitterstitches host a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.Actor.KpxhSWRIhG7ns5NA]{Spider Swarm} within themselves, which erupts out when the Skitterstitch is destroyed
iJUSlDT7ZVFtjNSy.name: Spider Swarm Host

IFtGiv3KwyArYGb5.description: This heavy blade is favored by guardians of religious sites. It has a distinctive, crescent-shaped blade that seems to be a mix of a sickle and sword. It often has holes drilled into the blade or the pommel so that bells or other holy trinkets can be affixed to the weapon as an aid for prayer or mediation.
IFtGiv3KwyArYGb5.name: +1 Striking Temple Sword

K4f9RbGiZucMUGD8.description:
Trigger A creature within the monster's reach uses a manipulate action or a move action, makes a ranged attack, or leaves a square during a move action it's using.

Effect The monster attempts a melee Strike against the triggering creature. If the attack is a critical hit and the trigger was a manipulate action, the monster disrupts that action. This Strike doesn't count toward the monster's multiple attack penalty, and its multiple attack penalty doesn't apply to this Strike.
K4f9RbGiZucMUGD8.name: Attack of Opportunity

MRSyx2ZsaFXN3kSn.description: The veteran makes a melee Strike that counts as two attacks when calculating their multiple attack penalty. If this strike hits, it deals an extra die of weapon damage.
MRSyx2ZsaFXN3kSn.name: Power Attack

xzlfpLa29fzw4xH5.description: The veteran makes a melee Strike and compares the attack roll result to the AC of up to two foes, each of whom must be within their melee reach and adjacent to each other. Roll damage only once and apply it to each creature hit. A Swipe counts as two attacks for the veteran's multiple attack penalty.
xzlfpLa29fzw4xH5.name: Swipe

yJXSa8oHuL9yaPqg.description: The veteran isn't off-guard to hidden creatures and always gains a +4 circumstance bonus to their Perception DC against creatures attempting to Create a Diversion or Lie to the veteran.
yJXSa8oHuL9yaPqg.name: Wary

IH1SiADzFCDakX8w.description:
The slithering rift closes all pit spaces it created using Dimensional Pit, ejecting all its occupants onto the ground into random free spaces where the opening of the pit was.

Each occupant takes @Damage[9d6[bludgeoning]] damage (@Check[type:reflex|dc:40|basic:true] save).
IH1SiADzFCDakX8w.name: Out You Go

M7E6dxLskMLaX43G.description:
The slithering rift opens an extradimensional, 20-foot-deep pit that covers its own space and all adjacent squares unless they are walls or similarly blocking terrain.

Any other creature occupying spaces in the pit must succeed at a @Check[type:reflex|dc:40|traits:damaging-effect] save or fall into the pit, taking damage from the fall (typically @Damage[10[bludgeoning]] damage). Any creature grabbed by the ooze is released from the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Item.i18TlebMzwONyPhI]{Grab} and falls in, even if it was outside the pit squares.

While the pit is open, the slithering rift is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilized} and can't be forced to move. It can make pseudopod Strikes originating from the walls of the pit. A creature that starts its turn at the bottom of the pit takes @Damage[5d6[acid]] damage.

Creatures can climb the walls with a @Check[type:athletics|dc:40|name:Climb Out of the Rift|traits:action:climb] check. When the slithering rift dies, the pit closes and creatures inside are ejected, as Out you Go.
M7E6dxLskMLaX43G.name: Dimensional Pit

igIwGgzOBvjtlLdx.description:
A slithering rift is so clear that it's difficult to spot. A successful @Check[type:perception|dc:48] check is required to notice a stationary slithering rift, and a creature must be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.TiNDYUGlMmxzxBYU]{Searching} to attempt this check.

A creature that walks into the rift's space might fall into any pit currently in effect due to Dimensional Pit.
igIwGgzOBvjtlLdx.name: Transparent

nyahaCV93O7YYyau.description:
Ingesting an extradimensional space like that found in a bag of holding deals @Damage[12d8[force]] damage to the slithering rift and its occupants.

The slithering rift then immediately uses Out You Go.
nyahaCV93O7YYyau.name: Breach Vulnerability

zvkxJ9ZreNjX3yJL.description:
The slithering rift makes a single pseudopod Strike against each target within range it hasn't already @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{Grabbed}.

These attacks count toward the slithering rift's multiple attack penalty, but this penalty doesn't increase until after all of these attacks.
zvkxJ9ZreNjX3yJL.name: Flurry of Pods

8QnTTWcdqDNyOtIl.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:30]{30 feet} @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Item.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{Aura}

Creatures in the aura can't reduce the value of the sickened condition.

A creature that enters the aura or begins its turn in it must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:34] save or be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 2} (plus @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} as long as it is sickened on a critical failure).

A creature that succeeds at its save is temporarily immune for 1 minute.

Creatures made of water (such as water elementals) and plant creatures use an outcome one degree of success worse than the result of their save.
8QnTTWcdqDNyOtIl.name: Miasma of Pollution

wW8lBy7vi5CcDHTN.description:
The sordesdaemon exhales a spray of sewage that deals @Damage[8d6[acid]] damage and @Damage[8d6[poison]] damage in a @Template[type:cone|distance:30] (@Check[type:fortitude|dc:40|basic:true] save).

It can't use Retch of Foulness again for [[/br 1d4 #Recharge Retch of Foulness]]{1d4 rounds}.
wW8lBy7vi5CcDHTN.name: Retch of Foulness

ztgpLrKdJjctex5J.description:
Non-fiend creatures adjacent to the afflicted creature take a -1 circumstance penalty to saving throws against disease

Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:36]

Stage 1 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 1} (1 day)

Stage 2 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{Doomed 1} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 1} (1 day)

Stage 3 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{Doomed 1} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 2} (1 day)

Stage 4 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{Doomed 2} and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 2} (1 week)

Stage 5 dead.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.Item.gORyINQLvplfthlm]{Effect: Pollution Infusion}
ztgpLrKdJjctex5J.name: Pollution Infusion

Sordesdaemon.name: Sordesdaemon
Sordesdaemon.npcAllSaves: +1 status to all saves vs. magic

EjxAC6le3nK3Lfmx.description: Longswords can be one-edged or two-edged swords. Their blades are heavy and they're between 3 and 4 feet in length.
EjxAC6le3nK3Lfmx.name: +1 Striking Longsword

Eq6IkJnS6klg5Kqj.description: The commando designates a single creature as their culprit. The commando gains a +2 circumstance bonus to Perception checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.BlAOM2X92SI6HMtJ]{Seek} their culprit and a +2 circumstance bonus to Survival checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.EA5vuSgJfiHH7plD]{Track} their culprit. The commando's attacks deal an additional 2d8 precision damage to the culprit. This designation lasts for 24 hours or until the commando targets another creature with this ability.
Eq6IkJnS6klg5Kqj.name: Target Culprit

wPp48cMhLkEqI4UE.description: A commando's thunderstone is infused with special reagents to produce a blinding flash of light. In addition to the thunderstone's normal effects, creatures that fail the saving throw against the thunderstone are also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{Dazzled} for 1 round. Creatures that critically fail are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded} for 1 round. Creatures who protect their eyes, such as by wearing tinted goggles, are immune to the infused thunderstone's blinding effect.
wPp48cMhLkEqI4UE.name: Binding Blast

z84wqzko1RPXKwRr.description: This ranged weapon has a bow-like assembly mounted on a handled frame called a tiller. The tiller has a mechanism to lock the bowstring in place, attached to a trigger mechanism that releases the tension and launches a bolt.
z84wqzko1RPXKwRr.name: +1 Striking Crossbow

zlY2IvuCU0h5iOV8.description:
When this stone hits a creature or a hard surface, it explodes with a deafening bang. A thunderstone deals the listed sonic damage and sonic splash damage, and each creature within 10 feet of the space in which the stone exploded must succeed at a Fortitude saving throw with the listed DC or be deafened until the end of its next turn. Many types of thunderstone grant an item bonus to attack rolls.

You gain a +2 item bonus to attack rolls. The bomb deals 3d4 sonic damage and 3 sonic splash damage, and the DC is 28.
zlY2IvuCU0h5iOV8.name: Thunderstone (Greater)

Summoning Rune (Barbazu Devil).description: A summoning circle inlaid into the room's floor detects living creatures and summons a violent devil.
Summoning Rune (Barbazu Devil).hazardDisable: @Check[type:perception|dc:18|name:Notice the Trap's Magic|traits:action:seek] to notice the trap's magic and avoid stepping on the floor outside the circle, followed by @Check[type:thievery|dc:21|name:Break Summoning Circle|traits:action:disable-a-device] (trained) to break the circle or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{Dispel Magic} (3rd level; counteract DC 23) to counteract the rune
Summoning Rune (Barbazu Devil).hazardReset: The trap resets each day at dawn.
Summoning Rune (Barbazu Devil).name: Summoning Rune (Barbazu Devil)

Summoning Rune (Cinder Rat).description: An invisible cloud of magical sensors detects living creatures in the room and summons fire elementals to slay the creatures.
Summoning Rune (Cinder Rat).hazardDisable: @Check[type:acrobatics|dc:22|name:Approach Rune] (trained) to approach without triggering the trap, followed by @Check[type:thievery|dc:22|name:Erase Summoning Rune|traits:action:disable-a-device] (trained) to erase the rune or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{Dispel Magic} (3rd level; counteract DC 20) to counteract the rune
Summoning Rune (Cinder Rat).hazardReset: The trap resets each day at dawn.
Summoning Rune (Cinder Rat).name: Summoning Rune (Cinder Rat)

Supplicant Statues.description: Six statues rapidly slide around the room on rollers, slowing down intruders and striking at them with spring-loaded sword arms.
Supplicant Statues.hazardDisable: @Check[type:thievery|dc:34|name:Disable Statue Rollers|traits:action:disable-a-device] (master) to disable a specific statue's rollers, or @Check[type:thievery|dc:39|name:Disable Trap (Control Panel)|traits:action:disable-a-device] (master) on the control panel in A4 deactivates the whole trap. For each statue disabled, the trap loses 1 action from its routine and the DC for its predictive impediment ability decreases by 4. @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{Dispel Magic} (7th level, counteract DC 32) doesn't harm the statues but removes the predictive impediment ability. Breaking the control panel prevents the trap from resetting.
Supplicant Statues.hazardReset: The trap deactivates and resets one minute after the room is empty.
Supplicant Statues.hazardRoutine: (6 actions) On the trap's initiative, each functioning statue slides up to 40 feet around the room and makes a statue shortsword Strike against an adjacent creature. The trap doesn't take a multiple attack penalty, and the statues' movements don't trigger reactions.
Supplicant Statues.name: Supplicant Statues

1sozJvnrR9nNQ2qu.description: A svartalfar killer deals an extra 2d6 precision damage to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} creatures.

8RfMfocN311lqv8N.description:
The svartalfar killer chooses @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.gISYsBFby1TiXfBt]{Acid Splash}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.O9w7r4BKgPogYDDe]{Produce Flame}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.J7Y7tl0bbdz7TcCc]{Ray of Enfeeblement}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.r3NeUnsgt9mS03Sn]{Shocking Grasp} and makes a melee Strike.

If the svartalfar killer hits, they cast the chosen spell through the weapon at the same target. The spell's attack roll is the same result as the Strike.
8RfMfocN311lqv8N.name: Spell-Imbued Blade

C01m9GnZW7b5Uk9K.description:
The svartalfar killer fades into shadow, Strides up to twice its Speed, and reforms.

This movement doesn't trigger reactions, but the svartalfar killer must begin and end in an area of dim light or darkness.
C01m9GnZW7b5Uk9K.name: Shadow Step

geGkPY2Pq1GYIJoN.description:
The opaque white sap from the graveroot shrub clouds the mind.

Activate D Interact (Injury)

Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:19]

Maximum Duration 4 rounds

Stage 1 @Damage[1d10[poison]] damage (1 round)

Stage 2 @Damage[1d12[poison]] damage and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{Stupefied 1} (1 round)

Stage 3 @Damage[2d6[poison]] damage and stupefied 2 (1 round)

GUrHLtuqnl4x3KHH.description:
The tenome Strides twice, Steps twice, or Steps and Strides (in either order).

It cannot use Burst of Speed again for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds}.
GUrHLtuqnl4x3KHH.name: Burst of Speed

hzLoXfk0XZ09nziz.description:
1 or 2 actions

A tenome can gaze at a creature within 30 feet by presenting one of its eyes. The target must succeed at a @Check[type:will|dc:21] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1}. If the tenome uses 2 actions and presents both of its eyes, the target is also @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{Paralyzed} if it fails the save.

A creature that successfully saves is temporarily immune for 24 hours.
hzLoXfk0XZ09nziz.name: Terrifying Gaze

k0BFzCiBWr8fRZ4m.description: While the tenome is Grabbing a creature, all other creatures are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{Concealed} to the tenome.
k0BFzCiBWr8fRZ4m.name: Obscuring Grab

zMxrSkK2U9CDEp0u.description:
Requirement The tenome has a creature grabbed or restrained

Effect The tenome makes a jaws Strike against the grabbed or restrained creature. If the Strike hits, the creature must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:18] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 1} (or the value of the creature's drained condition increases by 1 if it already has a drained value, to a maximum of drained 4).

The tenome regains [[/r 1d8[healing]]] Hit Points each time it uses Bone Drink.
zMxrSkK2U9CDEp0u.name: Bone Drink

8qsC3gMbkSTTQOdY.description:
Requirement The teraphant has a creature grabbed

Effect The teraphant slams the creature onto one of its horns. The target must attempt a @Check[type:reflex|dc:27|basic:true] save or suffer @Damage[(3d6+9)[piercing]] damage and @Damage[1d6[bleed]] (@Damage[(6d6+18)[piercing]] damage on a critical failure).
8qsC3gMbkSTTQOdY.name: Impale

k1m2BVdO1iqRouch.description: A teraphant can sense the emotions of creatures within 120 feet as an imprecise sense. Emotion sense is a precise sense against creatures under an emotion effect. A creature under the effects of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.b515AZlB0sridKSq]{Calm} can't be noticed via emotion sense.
k1m2BVdO1iqRouch.name: Emotion Sense 120 feet

kPfYHs4PPwutz153.description: A Medium or smaller creature hit by the teraphant's trunk is grabbed. If the teraphant moves, it can bring the grabbed creature along with it.
kPfYHs4PPwutz153.name: Grabbing Trunk

s1576Kzeq8JMVNz7.description:
Trigger A creature within 60 feet of the teraphant is targeted by a spell or ability with the emotion trait

Effect The teraphant also benefits from the spell or effect, as though it were an additional target for 1 minute or until the triggering spell or ability ends.
s1576Kzeq8JMVNz7.name: Empathetic Response

wCtIIrUW3W5fxJS5.description:
The teraphant lets out a loud trumpet that deals @Damage[8d8[mental]] damage (@Check[type:will|dc:27|basic:true] save) in a @Template[type:cone|distance:30]. A creature that fails its save is also pushed 15 feet (30 feet on a critical failure).

If a pushed creatures strikes a solid barrier, it takes @Damage[3d6[bludgeoning]] damage and stops.

The teraphant can't use Psychokinetic Trumpet again for [[/br 1d4 #Recharge Psychokinetic Trumpet]]{1d4 rounds}.
wCtIIrUW3W5fxJS5.name: Psychokinetic Trumpet

The Inkmaster.description:
Shemhazians rise from the souls of torturers and those who reveled in mutilating the physical bodies of their victims. Standing 35 feet tall, a shemhazian is well equipped with a wide range of talons, claws, and fangs to continue inflicting such torments on those it encounters.

Shemhazians delight in visiting torment upon mortals, of course, but more than most demons, these fiends revel in sharing the pain with their own kind. Other demons fear and hate shemhazians for this reason, with only the most powerful willing to work with a shemhazian to achieve a shared goal. Even then, the shemhazian is always on the watch for an opportunity to bring pain and suffering to its allies along with any foe.

4TtLSpRhmqV1Dvp1.description:
Trigger A creature within reach of the shemhazian's tail leaves a square during a move action it's using.

Effect The shemhazian attempts to Trip the triggering creature. On a success, the creature also takes damage as if the shemhazian had hit with a tail Strike, and if the creature was flying, it falls 30 feet.
4TtLSpRhmqV1Dvp1.name: Tail Whip

AsXbDxRSKFmiQ6jb.description: If the shemhazian's jaws Strike damages a creature, the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 3}. The target can attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:37] save to reduce this to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 1} (or be unaffected on a critical success).
AsXbDxRSKFmiQ6jb.name: Enfeebling Bite

EbuMoQ5idyQJDEXD.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:30]{30 feet} @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Item.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{Aura}

A non-evil creature that ends its turn in the aura must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:35] save. If it fails, it's slowed 1 for 1 round, and if it critically fails, it is instead paralyzed for 1 round.
EbuMoQ5idyQJDEXD.name: Paralyzing Gaze

Kfw3xJtFTIHlmDoM.description:
Requirements The monster's last action was a success with a Strike that lists Improved Grab in its damage entry, or it has a creature grabbed using this action.

Effect The monster automatically Grabs the target until the end of the monster's next turn. The creature is grabbed by whichever body part the monster attacked with, and that body part can't be used to Strike creatures until the grab is ended. Using Improved Grab extends the duration of the monster's Improved Grab until the end of its next turn for all creatures grabbed by it, but this costs an action. A grabbed creature can use the Escape action to get out of the grab, and the Grab ends for a grabbed creatures if the monster moves away from it.
Kfw3xJtFTIHlmDoM.name: Improved Grab

Tk7abWUpvDDV6Qg0.description: A shemhazian's mutilation is a part of them, and they can't bear to see it reversed. The first time each round that a creature heals from damage the shemhazian dealt on their last turn, the demon takes @Damage[3d6[mental]] damage.
Tk7abWUpvDDV6Qg0.name: Succor Vulnerability

aqwHyoUR6cj9y6s8.description: The shemhazian focuses their gaze on a non-evil creature they can see within 30 feet. If that creature isn't already slowed by the shemhazian's paralyzing gaze, it must attempt a save against the shemhazian's paralyzing gaze. If that creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed}, it must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:35] save or be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{Paralyzed} for 1 round. A shemhazian can't use this ability against the same creature more than once per round.
aqwHyoUR6cj9y6s8.name: Focused Gaze

l7wT4LDdfJXJETHf.description: A second brain, made of clockwork, is implanted in the Inkmaster's skull. Any time he makes a Will save, he rolls twice and takes the higher result.
l7wT4LDdfJXJETHf.name: Clockwork Brain

The Inkmaster.name: The Inkmaster
The Inkmaster.npcAllSaves: +1 status to all saves vs. magic

The Laughing Fiend's Greeting.description: Subtle but deadly magical runes link this mural to Kharnas's master. Good- or neutral-aligned creatures who examine the mural witness the castle's drawbridge silently descend, revealing an endless darkness.
The Laughing Fiend's Greeting.hazardDisable: @Check[type:thievery|dc:44|name:Disable Thievery] (legendary) to obscure or mar the magical runes set into the mural, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{Dispel Magic} (9th level; counteract DC 42) to counteract the mural
The Laughing Fiend's Greeting.name: The Laughing Fiend's Greeting

2A9TNsqY3jsY4TNh.description:
This +2 greater striking dancing shortsword has a golden handguard resembling a bird with outstretched wings. The sword's blade is broken halfway up its length, but this doesn't impair the sword's function.

Activate 1 command, Interact

Effect You attempt to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]{Trip} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Dt6B1slsBy8ipJu9]{Disarm} an opponent using Thievery instead of Athletics, and you add the blade of the Rabbit Prince's item bonus to the check. You do not need to have a hand free if you're wielding the blade of the Rabbit Prince, and your target can be up to two sizes larger than you.

Craft Requirements You must craft the blade in the Harrowed Realm.
2A9TNsqY3jsY4TNh.name: Blade of the Rabbit Prince

2EL49f3yp855RUpq.description: The Rabbit Prince doesn't trigger reactions with his movement or with any use of the Thievery skill.
2EL49f3yp855RUpq.name: Quick Movements

9KEf9z8ZVsw7qXJg.description: Whenever the Rabbit Prince deals piercing damage, he also deals 2d10 persistent bleed damage.
9KEf9z8ZVsw7qXJg.name: Bloody Jab

CgEMdYYlkqnUPBfB.description: If the Rabbit Prince rolls a success on a Will save, he gets a critical success instead, and if he rolls a critical failure, he gets a failure instead.
CgEMdYYlkqnUPBfB.name: Perfect Will

OofTe2WDiLiEdYTm.description:
Frequency once per day

Trigger The Rabbit Prince fails a skill check or a saving throw

Effect The Rabbit Prince rerolls the triggering check, but he must use the new result, even if it's worse.
OofTe2WDiLiEdYTm.name: Halfling Luck

cg0RVhBfO8MxjPpI.description: The Rabbit Prince automatically critically succeeds at Seek actions to find hidden or undetected creatures within 30 feet and at flat checks to target creatures within 30 feet that are concealed or hidden from him.
cg0RVhBfO8MxjPpI.name: Superior Senses

s4YFi2Scm3NoZSHU.description: The Rabbit Prince Strides and makes a blade of the Rabbit Prince Strike and a harrow card Strike at any point during the Stride. His multiple attack penalty increases only after both attacks.
s4YFi2Scm3NoZSHU.name: Darting Flurry

1bSj6FFb2A1ZOyrZ.name: +2 Status to All Saves vs. Mental

8kuBPd4vWsUhaCao.description: A creature hit by the Stabbing Beast's venom stream must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:33] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded} for [[/br 1d4 #Blinded Duration]]{1d4 rounds}.
8kuBPd4vWsUhaCao.name: Blinding Stream

akEAcbm2fRfGZg8v.description:
Requirements The Stabbing Beast is using Change Shape

Effect The Stabbing Beast summons one or two +2 greater striking keen shortswords into their hands. These weapons disappear if they leave the Stabbing Beast's grasp or if the Stabbing Beast ends Change Shape.
akEAcbm2fRfGZg8v.name: Conjure Swords

pEH5ZGr2J9sZg6ce.description:
While a creature is enfeebled from this poison, it is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{Doomed 1}

Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:36]

Maximum Duration 6 rounds

Stage 1 @Damage[3d6[poison]] damage and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 2} (1 round)

Stage 2 @Damage[4d6[poison]] damage and enfeebled 2 (1 round)

Stage 3 @Damage[6d6[poison]] damage and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{Enfeebled 3} (1 round)
pEH5ZGr2J9sZg6ce.name: Stabbing Beast Venom

rhQHRT4MPNImnl8e.description:
Trigger The Stabbing Beast is transformed with Change Shape and rolls for initiative

Effect The Stabbing Beast ends Change Shape.
rhQHRT4MPNImnl8e.name: True Appearance

sgRdRygQY6ggn4fy.description: The Stabbing Beast takes on the appearance of a Medium humanoid with a scorpion's tail and chitinous, full-body plate armor. This doesn't change their Speed or Strikes, except that their reach becomes 5 feet and they can't make pincer Strikes.
sgRdRygQY6ggn4fy.name: Change Shape

The Winder.description: A large metallic arm, 20 feet long, is set into the floor. It rotates around the room to wind up nearby clockwork creatures.
The Winder.hazardDisable: @Check[type:thievery|dc:50|name:Deactivate System|traits:action:disable-a-device] (master) to deactivate the system, or @Check[type:athletics|dc:40|name:Jam Gears] (legendary) to jam the gears for 1 round
The Winder.hazardReset: The Winder resets as soon as no creatures remain in the room.
The Winder.hazardRoutine: (1, 2, or 4 actions, depending on the encounter's threat level) The Winder uses each of its actions to Wind clockwork assassins in the room, starting with inactive ones.
The Winder.name: The Winder

22ts3ClOQFeLq0Jt.description: The aquamancer is surrounded by a bubble of water that buffers attacks. Each round, the shield absorbs the first 25 damage that would be dealt to the aquamancer. The shield can absorb only bludgeoning, piercing, slashing, acid, cold, and fire damage types. The aquamancer can dismiss or raise their shield by spending a single action.
22ts3ClOQFeLq0Jt.name: Water Shield

dDbS7aNivWy3A1QB.description: A long metal shaft ending with a metal spike, a spear can be used one-handed as a melee weapon and can be thrown.
dDbS7aNivWy3A1QB.name: +2 Striking Spear

Tiderunner Aquamancer.name: Tiderunner Aquamancer
Tiderunner Aquamancer.npcAllSaves: +1 status to all saves vs. enchantments, -2 to all saves vs. aboleth effects

Ba9gUN2kmGTDwJ7v.description: Twisted Jack Strides three times. Once per Stride, he can attempt a war razor Strike against a creature in his reach at any point during the Stride; he must make each Strike against a different creature, but he doesn't apply his multiple attack penalty until after making all his Strikes. If any of the Strikes are a critical failure, Bloody Mayhem immediately ends.
Ba9gUN2kmGTDwJ7v.name: Bloody Mayhem

NvOUKM0pOaTFyrWw.description: Whenever Twisted Jack deals slashing damage, the target takes an additional 2d10 persistent bleed damage.
NvOUKM0pOaTFyrWw.name: Close Cutter

aV20X0Mp1CqH1tqz.description: Twisted Jack makes three ranged dagger Strikes, each against a separate target; he ignores the multiple attack penalty until after making all three Strikes. On a critical hit, the target takes @Damage[2d10[bleed]] damage and is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded} for 1 round.
aV20X0Mp1CqH1tqz.name: Fan of Daggers

aZlGemIJeXm9jJEE.description: Twisted Jack's ranged dagger Strikes have a range increment of 20 feet instead of 10 feet.
aZlGemIJeXm9jJEE.name: Knife Thrower

fer5YKRtixZJgTUl.description: This leather armor is reinforced with metal studs and sometimes small metal plates, providing most of the flexibility of leather armor with more robust protection.
fer5YKRtixZJgTUl.name: +2 Resilient Studded Leather Armor

oEHGOxor2V2wjqVL.description: A war razor is an exaggerated version of the barbers' tool. It is a brittle but extremely sharp weapon that is very easy to slip into a pocket or sleeve.
oEHGOxor2V2wjqVL.name: +2 Greater Striking War Razor

rUGUrNdhsxVMFs5r.description: Twisted Jack deals an additional 3d6 precision damage to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} targets.

9ShSRecAk97rJkLS.description: Tyrroicese can sense nearby motion through vibration and air movement.
9ShSRecAk97rJkLS.name: Motion Sense 60 feet

GnvMkeIBg6ZpYXzJ.description:
Tyrroicese makes up to three pseudopod strikes, each against a different creature.

Tyrroicese's multiple attack penalty doesn't increase until after all these attacks are made.
GnvMkeIBg6ZpYXzJ.name: Pseudopod Burst

RQ0R47s8yyK8gYS8.description:
Frequency once per round

Effect Tyrroicese forcefully extends a sticky pseudopod, plants it on a wall within 45 feet, and retracts the muscle.

Tyrroicese springs over to a space adjacent to the wall, moving through the intervening squares as normal but ignoring any difficult or greater difficult terrain.
RQ0R47s8yyK8gYS8.name: Stretching Step

bi6VcgRWUdub6hl4.description:
Tyrroicese lifts an adjacent dying creature with its pseudopods and subsumes that creature into its own oozy flesh. The subsumed creature's dying value does not increase, though it can't decrease either.

Tyrroicese regains 30 HP and also gains the ability to use one or two of the subsumed creature's special abilities or feats, subject to the GM's discretion.

A creature adjacent to Tyrroicese can extract a subsumed creature by spending 2 actions to attempt a @Check[type:athletics|dc:29|name:Extract Subsumed Creature] check.

On a success, the subsumed creature is pulled from Tyrroicese and falls into the nearest available space.
bi6VcgRWUdub6hl4.name: Subsume

haax0MkiNqA6MN2L.description:
When Tyrroicese subsumed Corporal Quordein, it gained a perverted form of the commander's ability to rally allies.

The first time Tyrroicese uses this ability, it summons an @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.Actor.uQBOJfjtzEXvpLQz]{Ochre Jelly}, which leaks out of the ceiling of area D13 and drops to the floor to join the fight, siding with Tyrroicese.

Thereafter, when Tyrroicese uses this ability, any oozes within 60 feet become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{Quickened} for 1 round (the oozes can use their extra action only to Stride) and, if they're not allied with the agents, the oozes ally themselves with Tyrroicese.
haax0MkiNqA6MN2L.name: Rallying Call

5B9QSKBjBa9tC0SG.description:
Requirements Ulressia hit a foe earlier this turn with a weapon Strike

Effect Ulressia makes a weapon Strike against the foe. On a success, the foe must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:41] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 1}. On a critical failure, the foe is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 2} instead.
5B9QSKBjBa9tC0SG.name: Stunning Strike

E9Cr9P2L3cp3NzRD.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:60]{60 feet} @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Item.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{Aura}

Any creature that ends its turn in the aura while in possession of any crystals, gemstones, or other precious stones must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:39|traits:damaging-effect] save.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected and is immune to the aura for 1 hour.

Success The creature is unaffected.

Failure The creature's crystals reverberate with Ulressia's vengeful aura, sharpening at every corner and digging, as if powerfully magnetized, into the creature's flesh.

The creature takes @Damage[4d6[piercing]] damage, plus @Damage[5[void]] damage for every 2,000 gp the crystals are cumulatively worth (maximum 40 damage).

The creature can't discard the crystals until they leave the aura or roll a successful save against it.

Critical Failure As failure, but @Damage[8d6[piercing]] damage, plus @Damage[10[void]] damage for every 2,000 gp of the crystals' value (maximum 80 damage).

Ulressia can deactivate or activate this aura using a single action, which has the concentrate trait.
E9Cr9P2L3cp3NzRD.name: Aura of Angry Crystals

JCwAfoQqJDmPTVLF.description: Ulressia automatically detects crystals or crystalline items within 30 feet.
JCwAfoQqJDmPTVLF.name: Crystal Sense (Imprecise) 30 feet

ukjOJLhlz5hOZcuy.description:
Ulressia channels her warped powers over crystals through her blade and into a creature's body, partially crystallizing its blood.

Ulressia makes a melee dagger Strike. On a hit, the creature takes damage as normal and must also roll a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:41] save.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 1}.

Failure The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 1}, plus @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} for 1 round.

Critical Failure The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{Drained 2}, plus @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds}.
ukjOJLhlz5hOZcuy.name: Crystallize Blood

Ulressia The Blessed.name: Ulressia The Blessed
Ulressia The Blessed.npcAllSaves: +1 status to all saves vs. magic

AQMbWGVUpkE6QLbs.description: The vargouille kisses an adjacent creature that's asleep, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{Paralyzed}, or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{Unconscious}, exposing it to the vargouille transformation disease.
AQMbWGVUpkE6QLbs.name: Kiss

IiO8ytUL6tJgUAXR.description:
Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:18|name:Vargouile Venom]

Stage 1 Damage the victim has taken from vargouille fangs can't be healed magically.

Once all vargouille fang damage has been healed nonmagically, the poison ends.
IiO8ytUL6tJgUAXR.name: Vargouille Venom

XKe1YQHD2E6lSSDn.description:
The vargouille shrieks, its scream so terrible that all non-vargouilles within 60 feet must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:16] save or be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{Paralyzed} for 3 rounds.

The effect ends early for a creature if the vargouille moves out of sight, moves farther than 60 feet from the creature, or attacks the creature with its fangs.

After attempting its save, a creature is immune to that particular vargouille's Shriek for 24 hours.
XKe1YQHD2E6lSSDn.name: Shriek

tMhjT7tf9r9vZX4C.description:
Exposing the victim to sunlight or any light spell of 3rd level or higher pauses the progression of the disease until the victim is no longer in light.

Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:18]

Stage 1 carrier with no effect ([[/br 1d6 #hours]] hours)

Stage 2 victim's hair falls out ([[/br 1d6 #hours]] hours)

Stage 3 victim's ears grow into leathery wings, tentacles sprout on the chin and scalp, and the teeth become long, pointed fangs (1 day)

Stage 4 victim's mind regresses to a vicious and unintelligent shell of its former self ([[/br 1d6 #hours]] hours)

Stage 5 victim's head breaks free of the body (which dies) and becomes a new vargouille
tMhjT7tf9r9vZX4C.name: Vargouille Transformation

97KS2uPGBbRl3fOQ.description:
@Check[type:reflex|dc:23|traits:damaging-effect], @Damage[(2d8+9)[acid]] damage, Escape DC 23, Rupture 14 (19 when using Metallify)

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.Engulf]

BasU6Iuc7hRxhoYG.description: The vaultbreaker ooze instinctually shapes its pseudopod into a key, lockpick, or tool required to bypass a locking mechanism; it uses this pseudopod as thieves' tools to Pick a Lock or Disable a Device.
BasU6Iuc7hRxhoYG.name: Form Tool

MyTJRF05gqbWnyPq.description:
Trigger A creature Strikes the vaultbreaker ooze

Effect The ooze's outer plasm hardens into a protective shell of precious metals. Until the start of its next turn, it gains resistance 5 to physical damage (except adamantine), it has a -5-foot penalty to its Speed, and its pseudopod Strikes gain the versatile S or P weapon trait.
MyTJRF05gqbWnyPq.name: Metallify

YhPJNRCs20xqntX6.description: A vaultbreaker ooze can sense nearby motion through vibration and air movement.
YhPJNRCs20xqntX6.name: Motion Sense 60 feet

efKlG6Tj9bAd6SQ9.description: The vaultbreaker ooze's metallic plasm alerts it to the presence of metals with the precious trait (including gold and platinum) within 30 feet.
efKlG6Tj9bAd6SQ9.name: Treasure Sense (Imprecise) 30 feet

Vaultbreaker Ooze.name: Vaultbreaker Ooze
Vaultbreaker Ooze.npcSenses: motion sense 60 feet; treasure sense (imprecise) 30 feet

CVTZnv3ZcE4LbDPg.description:
The time dragon breathes in one of two ways.

The dragon can't use Breath Weapon again for [[/br 1d4 #Recharge Breath Weapon]]{1d4 rounds}.

Storm The dragon breathes a burst of lightning in a @Template[type:cone|distance:50] that deals @Damage[20d6[electricity]] damage (@Check[type:reflex|dc:42|basic:true|name:Storm Breath] save).

Time Displacement (arcane, transmutation) The dragon breathes a time storm. Each creature within a @Template[type:cone|distance:50] must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:42|name:Time Displacement Breath|traits:transmutation] save.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 1}.

Failure The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 4}.

Critical Failure The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{Stunned 6}.
CVTZnv3ZcE4LbDPg.name: Breath Weapon

DrsLgW5tbXlYEqJ1.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:90]{90 feet} @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Item.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{Aura}

A creature that first enters the area must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:42] save.

Regardless of the result of the saving throw, the creature is temporarily immune to the Veksciralenix's Alien Presence for 1 minute.

Critical Success The creature is unaffected.

Success The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} for 1 round.

Failure The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4 rounds}.

Critical Failure The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} for 1 minute.
DrsLgW5tbXlYEqJ1.name: Alien Presence

UAnT1rt4pcCFs6br.description: Veksciralenix makes two claw Strikes and one wing Strike in any order.
UAnT1rt4pcCFs6br.name: Draconic Frenzy

ikVC2siqOrYTYZtS.description:
Frequency three times per day

Trigger Veksciralenix or a creature that Veksciralenix can see attempts a check and learns the results

Effect The triggering creature rerolls the triggering check and takes the second result.
ikVC2siqOrYTYZtS.name: Second Chance

r47iaCjc2jC8iNnL.description: Veksciralenix recharges their Breath Weapon whenever they score a critical hit with a Strike.
r47iaCjc2jC8iNnL.name: Draconic Momentum

Veksciralenix.name: Veksciralenix
Veksciralenix.npcAllSaves: +1 status to all saves vs. magic

9HOzCgOAKeHP5EhB.description:
Trigger The venom mage is reduced to 0 Hit Points

Effect The venom mage explodes into a cloud of poison within a @Template[type:burst|distance:20]. The venom mage then reforms at a point they choose within the burst, avoids being knocked out, and remains at 1 Hit Point. The venom mage's wounded value increases by 1 when they use this ability, and they can't use this ability when they're wounded 3 or more. Creatures other than the venom mage within the burst must attempt a Fortitude save.

Critical Success No effect.

Success The creature is sickened 1.

Failure The creature is sickened 2 and cannot recover from the sickened condition while within 20 feet of the venom mage.

Critical Failure As failure, but sickened 4.
9HOzCgOAKeHP5EhB.name: Venom Explosion

hHlYjJTlmZGddvQY.description:
This gnarled staff is covered with thorns and coated with a glistening lacquer that acts as a minor irritant. While holding the staff, you aren't affected by its coating or thorns, and you reduce the DC of your flat checks to overcome persistent poison damage from 15 to 13.

Activate @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.aBQ8ajvEBByv45yz]{Cast a Spell}

Effect You expend a number of charges from the staff to cast a spell from its list.

Craft Requirements Supply one casting of all listed levels of all listed spells.

  • Cantrips @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.izcxFQFwf3woCnFs]{Guidance}
  • 1st @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.QqxwHeYEVylkYjsO]{Detect Poison}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.DYdvMZ8G2LiSLVWw]{Spider Sting}
hHlYjJTlmZGddvQY.name: Poisoner's Staff

wazlV57b7ZEUGjn6.description: If another creature's reaction would disrupt the venom mage's spellcasting action, the venom mage attempts a @Check[type:flat|dc:15] check. If the venom mage succeeds, their action isn't disrupted.
wazlV57b7ZEUGjn6.name: Steady Spellcasting

8QIEpGKWvwKK8mSZ.description:
The Washboard Dog scrapes their weapon up and down their washboard shield, making such a clatter that it's hard to hear anything over the din. Until the beginning of the Washboard Dog tough's next turn, all creatures within 30 feet gain a +1 circumstance bonus to any saves to resist auditory spells or abilities.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.Item.wcNGbhwn3AuamtsX]{Effect: Scraping Clamor}
8QIEpGKWvwKK8mSZ.name: Scraping Clamor

ZbNsjTdTl9JRvGxk.description: Whenever the gang tough makes a successful melee Strike against a frightened creature, the Strike deals an extra weapon die of damage.
ZbNsjTdTl9JRvGxk.name: Bullyrag Beatdown

aZvRC9a03MwZf7rr.description: When the gang tough's Strike with a bludgeoning weapon is a critical hit and deals damage, the target becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{Frightened 1}.
aZvRC9a03MwZf7rr.name: Frightening Critical

Water Elemental Vessel.description: Spellcasters create elemental vessels by harvesting raw elemental energy and then binding it within a specially enchanted magic circle to grant it life.

N85UwJsuAe8nwuWV.description: By performing an hour-long ritual, an elemental vessel can form a spell circle with an arcane or primal spellcaster. After the spell circle is formed, other spellcasters can join the spell circle by performing the same hour-long ritual while assisted by at least one spellcaster already in the spell circle. Each member of the spell circle must contribute at least one spell to the elemental vessel. The spellcaster permanently loses access to a spell slot equal to the spell's level and the elemental vessel adds the contributed spell to its list of arcane innate spells (regardless of the spell's original type). An elemental vessel can be imbued with no more than three spells per spell level. If the elemental vessel is destroyed, all members of the spell circle regain the spell slots they contributed to the creature. The arcane innate spells shown below represent a typical spell list for an elemental vessel, but each elemental vessel is likely to have different spells depending on what its spell circle has contributed.
N85UwJsuAe8nwuWV.name: Spell Circle

fgprZ9vs1zfRUz3o.description: Whenever a creature successfully counteracts one of its spells, the vessel permanently loses access to that spell and takes damage equal to 4 the spell's level. The spell circle member who contributed that spell regains access to their contributed spell slot.
fgprZ9vs1zfRUz3o.name: Dispel Vulnerability

g8bRqHNpfEqsTYyx.description: The elemental vessel targets an engulfed creature with one of its spells. The spell must have a range of touch.
g8bRqHNpfEqsTYyx.name: Internal Spell Strike

jJSKOhaRoCp1WwP4.description: Any member of the elemental vessel's spell circle can spend 3 actions to mentally inhabit the vessel for 1 round. While they inhabit the vessel, the inhabiter controls the vessel's actions, and the vessel uses the inhabiter's Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma modifiers for all checks. Only one creature can inhabit an elemental vessel at a time.
jJSKOhaRoCp1WwP4.name: Inhabit Vessel

Water Elemental Vessel.name: Water Elemental Vessel

Water Elemental Vessel (I2).description: Spellcasters create elemental vessels by harvesting raw elemental energy and then binding it within a specially enchanted magic circle to grant it life.

N85UwJsuAe8nwuWV.description: By performing an hour-long ritual, an elemental vessel can form a spell circle with an arcane or primal spellcaster. After the spell circle is formed, other spellcasters can join the spell circle by performing the same hour-long ritual while assisted by at least one spellcaster already in the spell circle. Each member of the spell circle must contribute at least one spell to the elemental vessel. The spellcaster permanently loses access to a spell slot equal to the spell's level and the elemental vessel adds the contributed spell to its list of arcane innate spells (regardless of the spell's original type). An elemental vessel can be imbued with no more than three spells per spell level. If the elemental vessel is destroyed, all members of the spell circle regain the spell slots they contributed to the creature. The arcane innate spells shown below represent a typical spell list for an elemental vessel, but each elemental vessel is likely to have different spells depending on what its spell circle has contributed.
N85UwJsuAe8nwuWV.name: Spell Circle

fgprZ9vs1zfRUz3o.description: Whenever a creature successfully counteracts one of its spells, the vessel permanently loses access to that spell and takes damage equal to 4 the spell's level. The spell circle member who contributed that spell regains access to their contributed spell slot.
fgprZ9vs1zfRUz3o.name: Dispel Vulnerability

g8bRqHNpfEqsTYyx.description: The elemental vessel targets an engulfed creature with one of its spells. The spell must have a range of touch.
g8bRqHNpfEqsTYyx.name: Internal Spell Strike

jJSKOhaRoCp1WwP4.description: Any member of the elemental vessel's spell circle can spend 3 actions to mentally inhabit the vessel for 1 round. While they inhabit the vessel, the inhabiter controls the vessel's actions, and the vessel uses the inhabiter's Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma modifiers for all checks. Only one creature can inhabit an elemental vessel at a time.
jJSKOhaRoCp1WwP4.name: Inhabit Vessel

Water Elemental Vessel (I2).name: Water Elemental Vessel (I2)

Waxworks Onslaught Trap.description: Four huge tubs containing congealed wax, enchanted to melt and envelop unwary intruders, each sit atop a cold fire.
Waxworks Onslaught Trap.hazardDisable: @Check[type:thievery|dc:43|name:Drain Wax from a Tub|traits:action:disable-a-device] (master) to drain the wax from a tub or @Check[type:athletics|dc:45|name:Push Through Wax|traits:action:force-open] (master) to push through the wax blocking a sealed door and escape (other creatures must push their own way through, as the wax reseals)
Waxworks Onslaught Trap.hazardReset: The trap deactivates and resets after 1 hour. At that time, the wax in the tubs cools and congeals, and any wax elsewhere in the room magically goes back into the tubs.
Waxworks Onslaught Trap.hazardRoutine: (4 actions) The trap loses 1 action each turn per drained or destroyed tub. On each action, a different tub spews hot wax at a random creature in the room, dealing 3d12 fire damage to the target and all adjacent creatures (@Check[type:reflex|dc:35|basic:true]). On a failure or critical failure, the creature is also encased in hot wax. A creature that starts its turn encased in wax takes 8d12 fire damage and is immobilized until it Escapes the hardening wax (DC 35). Each turn it remains encased, the damage dealt by the hot wax decreases by 2d12 but the DC to Escape increases by 2 (minimum 0 damage, maximum DC 43). A creature that can't get free from the wax might suffocate.
Waxworks Onslaught Trap.name: Waxworks Onslaught Trap

1Rk88GORg0fjreo8.description:
Requirements The Skinner has an adjacent creature grabbed with her spiked chain

Effect The Skinner attempts an @Check[type:athletics|defense:reflex] check against the grabbed creature's Reflex save DC. On a success, the Skinner knots her chain around the grabbed creature, which becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{Restrained} (Escape DC = 10 + the result of the Skinner's Athletics check); on a critical success, the creature also falls @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{Prone}.

Regardless of whether the Skinner succeeds, she drops the chain.
1Rk88GORg0fjreo8.name: Chain Up

ZNWERIfXN1fj8u4P.description: The Skinner can effectively wield abnormally long spiked chains and can do so using only one hand.
ZNWERIfXN1fj8u4P.name: Chain Expert

mIVZhiAlmqc8WWY7.description: Whenever the Skinner makes a successful cleaver Strike against a grabbed creature, she also deals @Damage[1d6[bleed]] (or @Damage[2d6[bleed]] on a critical hit).
mIVZhiAlmqc8WWY7.name: Flay

vW6qQ6HvTQdopnBl.description: Any creature taking @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{Persistent Bleed Damage} is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} against the Skinner's attacks. When attacking an off-guard creature, the Skinner deals an additional 2d6 precision damage.
vW6qQ6HvTQdopnBl.name: Bloody Sneak Attack

wXT4WRYgfh7qLzdK.name: Key to the Skinsaw Sanctum Vault

z53waMQlGY7ahvCA.description:
Requirements The Skinner has a creature grabbed with her spiked chain

Effect The Skinner pulls the creature into the nearest open adjacent square and makes a cleaver Strike against the creature.
z53waMQlGY7ahvCA.name: Hook and Flay

0UpmO63mWa667Q99.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:60]{60 feet} @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Item.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{Aura}

Allies of lower level than Wynsal in the aura gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Item.hFtNbo1LKYCoDy2O]{Attack of Opportunity} reaction. Allies who already have the Attack of Opportunity reaction can use it when a creature within their reach uses a concentrate action, in addition to normal triggers, and they disrupt a triggering concentrate action on a critical hit.
0UpmO63mWa667Q99.name: Tactical Aura

345q6v1fOXwCpJpM.description:
Trigger A creature within the monster's reach uses a manipulate action or a move action, makes a ranged attack, or leaves a square during a move action it's using.

Effect The monster attempts a melee Strike against the triggering creature. If the attack is a critical hit and the trigger was a manipulate action, the monster disrupts that action. This Strike doesn't count toward the monster's multiple attack penalty, and its multiple attack penalty doesn't apply to this Strike.
345q6v1fOXwCpJpM.name: Attack of Opportunity

6Nu42xqROJzl0XrC.description: A foe that takes damage from Wynsal's melee Strike is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{Slowed 1} for 1 round. If it's already slowed, the value of the slowed condition increases by 1.
6Nu42xqROJzl0XrC.name: Hampering Strike

91SKDS1GriJwurmK.description:
Activate 2 Envision

Requirements You are an expert in Stealth

This teardrop-shaped gemstone has triangular facets and looks suitable for fancy attire, although close inspection shows that it's hollow. When it's activated, you can instantly impart up to 1 minute of speech (roughly 150 words) telepathically to any creatures you choose within 100 feet. You can impart this instantaneous telepathic message to creatures that you perceive and creatures @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{Hidden} to you, but you can't do so to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{Undetected} creatures. Once used, the whisper briolette becomes unusable and subtly vanishes within the next few minutes, rather than crumbling to dust.
91SKDS1GriJwurmK.name: Whisper Briolette

VVMmL1VxeAzF1IBI.description: Wynsal commands his allies to take action. Allies within 120 feet who hear and understand his order are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{Quickened 1} for 1 round and can use this extra action to Stride, Strike, or Step.
VVMmL1VxeAzF1IBI.name: Demanding Orders

YNkhegfdFfE7yfGn.description: Wynsal deals 3d8 extra damage to any creature that's within reach of at least two of his allies.
YNkhegfdFfE7yfGn.name: Formation Attack

mYdklqhaT2LcRlN3.description: Wynsal either ends a nonpermanent condition affecting him or counteracts a nonpermanent spell affecting him (counteract level 17th, counteract check [[/r 1d20+30 #Counteract]]{+30}). This doesn't remove Hit Point damage or prevent the spell or effect from affecting others. It can't remove an ongoing affliction or conditions from a situation outside his control (such as being grappled or flanked).
mYdklqhaT2LcRlN3.name: Determination

nUbnbXqOAEtycKyP.description: Plate mail consists of interlocking plates that encase nearly the entire body in a carapace of steel. It is costly and heavy, and the wearer often requires help to don it correctly, but it provides some of the best defense armor can supply. A suit of this armor comes with an undercoat of padded armor (see below) and a pair of gauntlets.
nUbnbXqOAEtycKyP.name: +2 Resilient Full Plate

ycb3x5FbTCDnmeGO.description: Longswords can be one-edged or two-edged swords. Their blades are heavy and they're between 3 and 4 feet in length.
ycb3x5FbTCDnmeGO.name: +2 Greater Striking Longsword

9hvKp9EJbq6Log0q.description:
Requirements The ghoul is adjacent to the corpse of an evil or chaotic creature that died within the last hour.

Effect The ghoul devours a chunk of the corpse and regains [[/r 6d6]] Hit Points. It can regain Hit Points from any given corpse only once.
9hvKp9EJbq6Log0q.name: Consume Flesh

PJdaCe5La2FhB5AN.description: The ghoul jumps up to half its Speed. This movement doesn't trigger reactions.
PJdaCe5La2FhB5AN.name: Swift Leap

QSKXWJ8br4qwHbtf.description: Any living, non-elf creature hit by a ghoul's attack must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:27] save or become @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{Paralyzed}. It can attempt a new save at the end of each of its turns, and the DC cumulatively decreases by 1 on each such save.
QSKXWJ8br4qwHbtf.name: Paralysis

j72OO3UZ0KrTLLO6.description:
Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:27]

Stage 1 carrier with no ill effect (1 day)

Stage 2 @Damage[2d6[void]] damage and regains half as many Hit Points from all healing (1 day)

Stage 3 as stage 2 (1 day)

Stage 4 @Damage[2d6[void]] damage and gains no benefit from healing (1 day)

Stage 5 as stage 4 (1 day)

Stage 6 dead, and rises as a zeal-damned ghoul the next midnight.
j72OO3UZ0KrTLLO6.name: Ghoul Fever

5izc2RKfDYtjIicX.description: When a zealborn is destroyed, it re-forms, fully healed, near a follower of its choice in [[/br 1d10 #days]]{1d10 days}. For the purposes of rejuvenation, a follower is defined as an intelligent creature who's well acquainted with the zealborn and is a true believer in the zealborn's mission, not merely a lukewarm supporter. A zealborn can be permanently destroyed only if they have no current followers or can be convinced to end their own life.
5izc2RKfDYtjIicX.name: Rejuvenation

7RZClAttcFohXVTd.description: Each time a creature willingly performs a service, quest, or task for the zealborn, the creature takes a cumulative -1 status penalty to saving throws against the zealborn's mental spells and abilities (maximum -4).
7RZClAttcFohXVTd.name: Little Favors

EbIhMOd0cHtkhNcM.description: A zealborn can't regain Hit Points through resting or negative healing; they feed only on the idealism of their supporters, regaining 10 Hit Points per day for each creature under the effects of a geas cast by the zealborn. Creatures under a zealborn's geas have their maximum HP reduced by 10 each day until they are burned away to a husk and perish. After 24 hours, such creatures rise as zeal-damned ghouls under the zealborn's control. Zeal-damned ghouls eat only the flesh of evil or chaotic creatures and deal an additional 1d6 chaotic and 1d6 negative damage with their attacks.
EbIhMOd0cHtkhNcM.name: Zealous Restoration

s3e8tlqX6GRkply1.description: This weapon has a short shaft ending in a metal ball studded with spikes.
s3e8tlqX6GRkply1.name: +1 Striking Morningstar

ekdPtlR0pjDVDM4T.description:
The zrukbat flies up to its Speed and makes a claw Strike at the end of its move.

If the claw attack hits, the target must succeed on a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:15] saving throw or be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{Blinded} for 1 round (or blinded for 1 minute on a critical failure). If the Strike was a critical hit, the target's save result is one degree of success worse.
ekdPtlR0pjDVDM4T.name: Go for the Eyes

glyWTuwYyEk8AaC1.description:
The zrukbat assumes the shape of any Small object or ornamentation, although the zrukbat's mimicked objects usually have unrealistic or suspicious quirks.

This doesn't change the zrukbat's size but can alter their coloration and visual appearance.

They have an automatic result of 23 on Deception checks and DCs to pass as the mimicked object.
glyWTuwYyEk8AaC1.name: Dubious Shifting
